translated: The reason is stated: because the application of words is seen in regard to the object of conceptual thought.

original: sgra rnams yul ni gang de nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: sgra rnams yul ni gang de nyid ces bya'o //
translated: The object of words is just that.

original: brda ni yul dus kyi rjes su 'gro ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: brda ni yul dus kyi rjes su 'gro ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt a convention a concomitance with a place and time?

original: de'i phyir des nye bar mtshon pa'i khyad par rnams la yang byed pa nyid ji ltar yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir des nye bar mtshon pa'i khyad par rnams la yang byed pa nyid ji ltar yin /
translated: Therefore, how can there be a function in regard to the particulars that are indicated by it?üîΩThe reply is: ‚ÄúThe words that are the sounds of names that correspond to the objects.‚ÄùüîΩThe idea is that it is said in this way.üîΩThe connection is in regard to the expression and the object of expression.

original: don ji snyed pa'i ming gi sgra rnams so zhes ji skad smras pas so snyam du sems pa la des 'di zhes ni 'brel pa la zhes bya ba ste brdas sgra dang don dag gi khyad par rnams rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya bar rtogs pa
analyzed: don ji snyed pa'i ming gi sgra rnams so zhes ji skad smras pas so snyam du sems pa la des 'di zhes ni 'brel pa la zhes bya ba ste brdas sgra dang don dag gi khyad par rnams rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya bar rtogs pa
translated: The convention is the cause of the understanding that a particular word is the expression and a particular object is the object of expression.

original: yin la / de 'di zhes bya ba yang mdun na gnas pa thams cad kyi thun mong ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: yin la / de 'di zhes bya ba yang mdun na gnas pa thams cad kyi thun mong ba nyid yin no //
translated: This is also common to all that is present in front of one.

original: dbang po'i tshogs @61b don med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sgra kho na las mngon sum skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po'i tshogs @61b don med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sgra kho na las mngon sum skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The collection of sense faculties would be meaningless, because direct perception arises from sound alone.

original: lkog tu gyur pa ni 'das pa yin no //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa ni 'das pa yin no //
translated: The hidden is the past.

original: don byed nus pa'i khyad par gyis snang ba tha dad pa ni dbye bas byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: don byed nus pa'i khyad par gyis snang ba tha dad pa ni dbye bas byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The difference in appearance due to the difference in the capacity for effective action is shown to be made by division:

original: don byed pa tha dad pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don byed pa tha dad pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: by the difference in the capacity for effective action.

original: de'i phyir yul thag ring po na gnas pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir yul thag ring po na gnas pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the statement ‚Äúbecause it is far away, etc.,‚Äù is unreasonable.

original: dngos po du ma la thag ring po na 'ga' zhig snang ba nye ba la yang de nyid yin no zhes ji ltar dngos po'i yul la snang ba ma yin par brjod /
analyzed: dngos po du ma la thag ring po na 'ga' zhig snang ba nye ba la yang de nyid yin no zhes ji ltar dngos po'i yul la snang ba ma yin par brjod /
translated: How can it be said that an object is not perceived in a distant place, when many things are perceived there, and it is said that it is near?

original: gang dag thag ring po na snang ba de dag kho na nye ba nyid la ni gzhan du yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang dag thag ring po na snang ba de dag kho na nye ba nyid la ni gzhan du yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because those things that appear far away are near, and because they are different.

original: thag ring ba dang nye ba dag yul gcig nyid ma yin pa'i phyir gsal bar snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa legs par gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: thag ring ba dang nye ba dag yul gcig nyid ma yin pa'i phyir gsal bar snang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa legs par gsungs pa yin no //
translated: It is well said that the distant and the near are not one and the same place.

original: 'di'i zhes bya ba ni lkog shal la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i'o //
analyzed: 'di'i zhes bya ba ni lkog shal la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i'o //
translated: Here refers to the cow with a dewlap, etc.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni ba lang zhes bya ba sgra'i ngo bo 'di yin no //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni ba lang zhes bya ba sgra'i ngo bo 'di yin no //
translated: This refers to the word cow, which is the essence of sound.

original: lkog tu gyur pa yang dran pa'i blo la gnas pa'i phyir de ltar tha snyad 'dogs pa yin no //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa yang dran pa'i blo la gnas pa'i phyir de ltar tha snyad 'dogs pa yin no //
translated: The hidden is also designated in this way because it is present in the mind of memory.

original: gang gi tshe yang mngon sum pa'i dngos po la ming gi byed pa yin pa de'i tshe yang 'di'i 'di'o zhes blo'i yul du byas pa nyid kyi mngon sum gyi brda'i yul dag gi snang ba tha dad pa yin par bstan pa ni mig la zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe yang mngon sum pa'i dngos po la ming gi byed pa yin pa de'i tshe yang 'di'i 'di'o zhes blo'i yul du byas pa nyid kyi mngon sum gyi brda'i yul dag gi snang ba tha dad pa yin par bstan pa ni mig la zhes bya'o //
translated: When the name is applied to a directly perceived entity, at that time also, the object of the mind, this is his, is the object of direct perception, and the appearance of the objects of the sign is different. This is shown by the eye, etc.

original: phan gang gas bya 'dogs byed kyi ngo bo zhes bya ba la phan gdags par bya ba ni brjod bya ste las so //
analyzed: phan gang gas bya 'dogs byed kyi ngo bo zhes bya ba la phan gdags par bya ba ni brjod bya ste las so //
translated: The essence of the one to be benefited and the one who benefits is the object of the mind. The one to be benefited is the object of expression, the action.

original: phan 'dogs par byed pa ni rjod byed de byed pa po'am byed pa'o //
analyzed: phan 'dogs par byed pa ni rjod byed de byed pa po'am byed pa'o //
translated: The expression is the benefit, the agent or instrument.

original: bskyed bya skyed byed kyang yod par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bskyed bya skyed byed kyang yod par bstan pa ni /
translated: The existence of the produced and producer is taught:

original: nges na res 'ga' ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges na res 'ga' ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is sometimes‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: blo'i ngo bo dang blo'i snang ba'i rig byed dag ni ngag gi rig byed yin la /üîΩgal te yang de dag mngon sum gyi yul du brjod bya nyid kyis sam /
analyzed: blo'i ngo bo dang blo'i snang ba'i rig byed dag ni ngag gi rig byed yin la / gal te yang de dag mngon sum gyi yul du brjod bya nyid kyis sam /
translated: The nature of the mind and the expression of the appearance of the mind are the expression of speech.üîΩEven though they are not the object of direct perception, they appear as the object of expression or the expression itself.

original: rjod byed nyid kyis las byed pa nyid du snang ba ma yin pa de lta mod kyi de nyid brjod bya dang cig shos yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: rjod byed nyid kyis las byed pa nyid du snang ba ma yin pa de lta mod kyi de nyid brjod bya dang cig shos yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If one thinks that they are the object of expression and the other is the expression,

original: brda byas pa'i sgra las de'i ngo bor snang ba med pas brda ni de'i yul can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: brda byas pa'i sgra las de'i ngo bor snang ba med pas brda ni de'i yul can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: the appearance of that nature from the sound of the agreed upon convention does not exist. Therefore, the convention is not its object. This is taught:

original: dbang po'i bya ba med pa la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dbang po'i bya ba med pa la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout the activity of the sense faculty‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: sgra las rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: sgra las rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: One may think that the intrinsic identity is understood from the sound.

original: 'brel pa ma byas pa ste ma brjod pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa ma byas pa ste ma brjod pa'o //
translated: It is not related, that is, not expressed.

original: gang la brda yin pa de'i brjod pa'i rim gyis dbang po'i @62a * //
analyzed: gang la brda yin pa de'i brjod pa'i rim gyis dbang po'i @62a * //
translated: The order of expression of that which is the sign is the order of the faculties.üîΩ

original: bya ba yod kyang sgra las rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bya ba yod kyang sgra las rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: The meaning is that although the operation of the sense faculty is present by the process of the expression of that which is the sign, there is no understanding from the word.

original: rang nyid kyis rtogs na dbang po'i bya ba med kyang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang nyid kyis rtogs na dbang po'i bya ba med kyang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If there were understanding by oneself, there would be understanding even without the operation of the sense faculty.

original: 'grel par bshad pa ni gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'grel par bshad pa ni gsal ba yin no //
translated: The explanation in the commentary is clear.üîΩThe thought is that the object which is similar to the word is experienced as being the conceptualization.

original: sgra dang mtshungs pa'i yul nyid rtog pa yin par nyams su myong ba dang 'gal ba yin no snyam du sems pa ni 'o na ji ltar 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pas ba lang ngo zhes bya ba ni blang bar bya ba'i yul min no //
analyzed: sgra dang mtshungs pa'i yul nyid rtog pa yin par nyams su myong ba dang 'gal ba yin no snyam du sems pa ni 'o na ji ltar 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pas ba lang ngo zhes bya ba ni blang bar bya ba'i yul min no //
translated: The thought is that if it is as you say, then the object of the word cow is not the object to be taken up.

original: sprul zhes bya ba ni dor bar bya ba'i yul yin no //
analyzed: sprul zhes bya ba ni dor bar bya ba'i yul yin no //
translated: The object of the word snake is the object to be rejected.

original: 'dzin pa la tha dad pa med pa bstan pa ni 'dzin par byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa la tha dad pa med pa bstan pa ni 'dzin par byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching of the non-difference of the apprehender is ‚Äúthe apprehender.‚Äù

original: gzung ba med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gzung ba med par bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of the non-existence of the apprehended is

original: 'di la rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúthe conceptualization.‚Äù

original: rtog pa med pa las gzung bya ldog pa'i bya ba'i khyad par ni /
analyzed: rtog pa med pa las gzung bya ldog pa'i bya ba'i khyad par ni /
translated: The difference in the activity of the non-conceptual is the opposite of the apprehended object.

original: gzung ba la 'dzin pa yin par gsal ba'i phyir bstan pa ni nges pa'i dang ni ma nges pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzung ba la 'dzin pa yin par gsal ba'i phyir bstan pa ni nges pa'i dang ni ma nges pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The teaching that the apprehender is the opposite of the apprehended object is stated by the words ‚Äúbecause of the clarity of the apprehender of the apprehended object.‚Äù

original: rjes su dpag pa yin no zhes bya ba ni dran pa la'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa yin no zhes bya ba ni dran pa la'o //
translated: The words ‚Äúthe ascertainment and non-ascertainment‚Äù are the inference.

original: sngon po'i mthong ba dang rnam par rtog pa dag la rgyun gyis 'jug la cig car 'jug pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni /üîΩrtog bcas rtog pa med pa'i yid //
analyzed: sngon po'i mthong ba dang rnam par rtog pa dag la rgyun gyis 'jug la cig car 'jug pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni / rtog bcas rtog pa med pa'i yid //
translated: The teaching that the seeing of blue and the conceptualization occur in a continuum and occur simultaneously is stated by the words

original: ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúthe conceptual and non-conceptual mind.‚Äù

original: 'jug pa myur phyir zhes bya ba ni mthong ba dang rnam par rtog pa dag rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gi'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa myur phyir zhes bya ba ni mthong ba dang rnam par rtog pa dag rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gi'o //
translated: The words ‚Äúbecause of the swift engagement‚Äù refer to the cause and effect of seeing and conceptualization.

original: rim gyis tha dad pa grub pa yin yang rmongs pas gcig nyid du mngon par sems pa byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim gyis tha dad pa grub pa yin yang rmongs pas gcig nyid du mngon par sems pa byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Even though the establishment of the difference is gradual, the thought of oneness arises because of delusion.

original: tha dad pa'i bsgrub pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i bsgrub pa bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of the establishment of the difference is stated by the words

original: gal te ba lang snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te ba lang snyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúif the conceptualization of a cow.‚Äù

original: yi ge'i rang gi mtshan nyid snang ba las rnam par rtog par mi 'dod kyi 'on kyang gsal ba'i 'dzin pa las yin no zhes zer ba la gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yi ge'i rang gi mtshan nyid snang ba las rnam par rtog par mi 'dod kyi 'on kyang gsal ba'i 'dzin pa las yin no zhes zer ba la gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The opponent says that he does not maintain that the conceptualization arises from the appearance of the intrinsic identity of the letters, but rather from the apprehension of the manifestation. Because refers to this.

original: yi ge mi gsal bar snang ba la ba khra mo'i rang gi mtshan nyid snang ba'i dbye ba bstan nas rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis kyang tha dad par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: yi ge mi gsal bar snang ba la ba khra mo'i rang gi mtshan nyid snang ba'i dbye ba bstan nas rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis kyang tha dad par bstan pa ni /
translated: Having taught the division of the appearance of the indistinct letters, he teaches their difference by means of concomitance and contraposition.

original: yi ger snang ba'i shes pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: yi ger snang ba'i shes pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The consciousness of the appearance of the letters is the consciousness that apprehends the manifestation of the letters.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid las mi gsal ba'i rjod byed kyi rnam pa bstan nas /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid las mi gsal ba'i rjod byed kyi rnam pa bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the indistinct expressive aspect that arises from the intrinsic identity,

original: brjod bya gzung ba'i rnam pa'i dbye ba bstan pa ni /
analyzed: brjod bya gzung ba'i rnam pa'i dbye ba bstan pa ni /
translated: he teaches the division of the apprehended object-aspect.

original: sngon gyi rang bzhin nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi rang bzhin nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The previous intrinsic identity is the intrinsic identity of the object.

original: 'bras bu gcig pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni ba lang gi shes pa gcig yod pa'i phyir yi ge ga la sogs pa gcig nyid du tha snyad lta @62b bu'o / rim gyis 'dzin par zhes bya ba ni dang po rtog pa med pa yin la /
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni ba lang gi shes pa gcig yod pa'i phyir yi ge ga la sogs pa gcig nyid du tha snyad lta @62b bu'o / rim gyis 'dzin par zhes bya ba ni dang po rtog pa med pa yin la /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthey are apprehended in sequence‚Äù means that the first is nonconceptual, and then the others are conceptual.

original: de nas rnam par rtog pa yin pa de bzhin du mi 'dzin pa bya ba yang rim gyis ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nas rnam par rtog pa yin pa de bzhin du mi 'dzin pa bya ba yang rim gyis ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthey are not apprehended in sequence‚Äù means that they are not apprehended in the order in which they are produced.

original: snang bar ma gyur ces bya ba ni mngon sum pa la'o //
analyzed: snang bar ma gyur ces bya ba ni mngon sum pa la'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthey do not appear‚Äù means that they do not appear in a direct perception.

original: der zhugs pas zhes bya ba ni yul med pa las te sems rang bzhin gyis zhugs bzhin pa de 'phangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: der zhugs pas zhes bya ba ni yul med pa las te sems rang bzhin gyis zhugs bzhin pa de 'phangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthey are engaged in that‚Äù means that they are engaged in the absence of an object. The meaning is that the mind is engaged in its own nature, and that is its projection.

original: dus nyams pas zhes bya ba ni don gyis rtogs pa med pa'i dus su kho na la bag chags sang pas rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dus nyams pas zhes bya ba ni don gyis rtogs pa med pa'i dus su kho na la bag chags sang pas rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthey are impaired by time‚Äù means that the conceptualization arises from the latent impressions that are present only when there is no apprehension of an object.

original: gzhan gyi yang zhes bya ba ni rgol ba po'i'o//
analyzed: gzhan gyi yang zhes bya ba ni rgol ba po'i'o//
translated: The phrase ‚Äúof others‚Äù means of the opponent.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni rigs tha dad pa'i rtog pa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni rigs tha dad pa'i rtog pa la'o //

analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag las dngos po stobs dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pa yin la / rigs pa de 'di rtog pa med par smra ba la yang mtshungs pa yin par bstan pa ni /

translated: The appearance of a circle is not the appearance of something else in between. The appearance of

original: gal te rigs pa 'di yin na sa ra dang grangs zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i rim pa rtogs pa med pa'i phyir khyad par med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gal te rigs pa 'di yin na sa ra dang grangs zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i rim pa rtogs pa med pa'i phyir khyad par med par bstan pa ni /
translated: If this is the reason, then the teaching that there is no difference is:

original: yid dag cig car zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yid dag cig car zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúbecause the mind is pure and simultaneous.‚Äù

original: yid dag dus gcig tu 'jug par byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni shes pa cig car mi skye ba ni yid kyi rtags so zhes bya'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: yid dag dus gcig tu 'jug par byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni shes pa cig car mi skye ba ni yid kyi rtags so zhes bya'i rigs pas so //
translated: Because the mind engages simultaneously, the reason is that consciousness does not arise simultaneously.

original: gzhan ni sgrub byed gzhan te mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni sgrub byed gzhan te mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
translated: The other is the other proof, and supreme is the best.

original: 'on te yi ge snga ma'i shes pas yi ge phyi ma bar du gcod pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on te yi ge snga ma'i shes pas yi ge phyi ma bar du gcod pa de'i phyir /
translated: But if you think that the consciousness of the previous letter interrupts the later letter,

original: cig car thos pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa la cig car du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: cig car thos pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa la cig car du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: therefore they are not heard simultaneously, then there is ‚Äúsimultaneous.‚Äù

original: yod pa na zhes bya ba ni bya ba byed pa rnams yin yang ngo //
analyzed: yod pa na zhes bya ba ni bya ba byed pa rnams yin yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúWhen it exists‚Äù means that even though they perform their functions,

original: lnga po rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni dri'i shes pa la gzugs dang / ro dang reg pa dang / sgra'i shes pa rnams dang yid kyi shes pas bar du chod kyang dus gcig tu snang ba yin na /üîΩde la snga ma'i yi ge'i shes pa @63a * //
analyzed: lnga po rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni dri'i shes pa la gzugs dang / ro dang reg pa dang / sgra'i shes pa rnams dang yid kyi shes pas bar du chod kyang dus gcig tu snang ba yin na / de la snga ma'i yi ge'i shes pa @63a * //
translated: If the consciousness of smell were to appear simultaneously with the consciousness of form, etc.,

original: gcig gis yi ge phyi ma la bar du chod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
analyzed: gcig gis yi ge phyi ma la bar du chod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
translated: what need is there to mention that the consciousness of the previous letter is interrupted by the consciousness of the subsequent letter?

original: de bzhin du gzugs kyi shes pa la yang shes pa lnga pos bar du chod pa yang brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs kyi shes pa la yang shes pa lnga pos bar du chod pa yang brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: The same should be said of the consciousness of form, etc.,

original: ming gi ni yi ge'i'o //
analyzed: ming gi ni yi ge'i'o //
translated: The name is made up of letters.

original: mthar thug pa ni mur thug pa ste 'dis ni yi ge'i skad cig pa nyid bstan to//
analyzed: mthar thug pa ni mur thug pa ste 'dis ni yi ge'i skad cig pa nyid bstan to//
translated: The end is the limit. This shows that the letters are momentary.

original: de'i shes pa yang de lta bu yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i shes pa yang de lta bu yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The consciousness of the name is also like that.

original: skad cig pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skad cig pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This shows that the consciousness is momentary.

original: de'i phyir snga ma la ches nyung bas bar du chod pa yin na ches shin tu cig car snang bar 'gyur ba zhig na de lta na ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir snga ma la ches nyung bas bar du chod pa yin na ches shin tu cig car snang bar 'gyur ba zhig na de lta na ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, if the consciousness of the previous letter is interrupted by the consciousness of the subsequent letter, which is much shorter, they would appear to be simultaneous, but they are not.

original: des na rim gyis yin yang bar du chod pa nyung ba nyid kyis byas pa ni cig car snang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rim gyis yin yang bar du chod pa nyung ba nyid kyis byas pa ni cig car snang ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, even though they are sequential, they appear simultaneously because there is a small interval between them.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: cig car nyid kho nas yin no //
analyzed: cig car nyid kho nas yin no //
translated: It is only simultaneity.

original: de bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúbecause of that‚Äù indicates that.

original: rnam par rtog pa yon tan dang ldan pa zhes bya bas yid kyi rnam shes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa yon tan dang ldan pa zhes bya bas yid kyi rnam shes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The statement ‚Äúconceptualization endowed with qualities‚Äù indicates mental consciousness.

original: kha'i ro myang ba zhes bya ba ni tsum pa na byed pa na'o //
analyzed: kha'i ro myang ba zhes bya ba ni tsum pa na byed pa na'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äútasting the flavor of the mouth‚Äù indicates the tongue faculty.

original: 'dis kyang reg pa dang ro'i rnam shes dag bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis kyang reg pa dang ro'i rnam shes dag bstan pa yin no //
translated: This also indicates the tactile and taste consciousnesses.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni cig car snang ba'i rgyu mtshan myur ba mi shes pa'i phyir rigs mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi cig car snang ba'i nang gi rgyu mtshan ji snyed pa de snyed kho na rigs mi mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i bar
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni cig car snang ba'i rgyu mtshan myur ba mi shes pa'i phyir rigs mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi cig car snang ba'i nang gi rgyu mtshan ji snyed pa de snyed kho na rigs mi mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i bar
translated: The statement ‚Äúbecause of that‚Äù indicates that the internal cause of the simultaneous appearance of conceptualizations of similar type is the same as the cause of the simultaneous appearance of conceptualizations of dissimilar type.

original: du gcod pa'i snang ba'i rgyu mtshan du mi 'gyur te khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: du gcod pa'i snang ba'i rgyu mtshan du mi 'gyur te khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The reason for the appearance of the two is not established, because there is no difference.

original: snang ba la yang khyad par med na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snang ba la yang khyad par med na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If there is no difference in the appearance,

original: rim gyis skye ba'i phyogs la yang gzhan la chags pa'i sems nyid gzhan la cis mi skye bar zhes bstan pa ni /üîΩgnyi ga la yang rtsod 'di yod //
analyzed: rim gyis skye ba'i phyogs la yang gzhan la chags pa'i sems nyid gzhan la cis mi skye bar zhes bstan pa ni / gnyi ga la yang rtsod 'di yod //
translated: In the case of gradual arising, why does the mind attached to one not arise in regard to another?

original: ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba'o //
translated: This is the dispute in both cases.

original: mgal me la sogs pa dang 'brel pa can gyi rjes su 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: mgal me la sogs pa dang 'brel pa can gyi rjes su 'gro ba ste /
translated: The following of the one who is related to the fire-brand,

original: rjes su 'jug pa des gnod pa de gang gi yin pa de ni gnod pa can no //
analyzed: rjes su 'jug pa des gnod pa de gang gi yin pa de ni gnod pa can no //
translated: that is, the one who is related to the fire-brand, is the one who is harmed by that.

original: mthong las zhes bya ba ni mig gis so //
analyzed: mthong las zhes bya ba ni mig gis so //
translated: From seeing means by the eye.

original: mthong ba zhes bya ba ni mig gi shes pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: mthong ba zhes bya ba ni mig gi shes pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: Seeing means of the eye-consciousnesses.

original: brda la rmongs pa nyid ni nus pa nyid do //
analyzed: brda la rmongs pa nyid ni nus pa nyid do //
translated: Delusion about the convention is the capacity.

original: de dag gi ni rgol ba po dag gi'o //
analyzed: de dag gi ni rgol ba po dag gi'o //
translated: Of them means of the disputants.

original: brda'i rgyu ni sgra rung bar snang ba'i shes pa yin la de khyod kyi 'dod pas byis pa rnams la mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brda'i rgyu ni sgra rung bar snang ba'i shes pa yin la de khyod kyi 'dod pas byis pa rnams la mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The cause of the sign is the cognition of the appearance of the sound as suitable. That is not so for you, because of the childishness of those who are not skilled in language.

original: yid yod ces bya ba ni sgrar rung ba'i snang ba'o //
analyzed: yid yod ces bya ba ni sgrar rung ba'i snang ba'o //
translated: The existence of the mind is the appearance of the sound as suitable.

original: de bzhin du dbang po las skyes pa yang rung ba nyid kyi snang ba srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang po las skyes pa yang rung ba nyid kyi snang ba srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the same way, it is possible that the arising from the sense faculty is also the appearance of suitability.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa las the tshom za ba can gyi dbang po @63b las skyes pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni /üîΩlhag ldan yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa las the tshom za ba can gyi dbang po @63b las skyes pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni / lhag ldan yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The arising from the sense faculty that is doubtful due to the reversal from the discordant class is taught.üîΩThe one possessing the remainder is the one who possesses the remainder of the object.

original: byis la sgrub par byed pa gang yin ni dpe la'o //
analyzed: byis la sgrub par byed pa gang yin ni dpe la'o //
translated: The proof for the childish is in the example.

original: de nyid 'dir yang ni dpe can te brda la byang ba la'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'dir yang ni dpe can te brda la byang ba la'o //
translated: That very thing is the example here, in the one who is skilled in language.

original: bshad pa byos zhes bya ba ji ltar yin te /
analyzed: bshad pa byos zhes bya ba ji ltar yin te /
translated: How is it that one should explain?

original: gang gi phyir tshad bang du me sgrub par byed pa'i mngon sum pa kho na rjes su dpag par bya ba la yang brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir tshad bang du me sgrub par byed pa'i mngon sum pa kho na rjes su dpag par bya ba la yang brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Because the direct perception that proves the existence of fire in the hearth is not to be stated with regard to the inferential object.

original: bstan pa ni bsgrub bya'i rang gi ngo bos ma grub pa la ni rigs pa 'di brjod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: bstan pa ni bsgrub bya'i rang gi ngo bos ma grub pa la ni rigs pa 'di brjod pa yin gyi /
translated: The teaching is that this reasoning is stated in regard to the non-establishment of the intrinsic reality of the probandum.

original: lkog tu gyur pa dang cig shos kyi ngo bo la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa dang cig shos kyi ngo bo la ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not in regard to the intrinsic reality of the hidden and the other.

original: gang gi phyir 'di la lkog tu gyur pa dang cig shos kyi ngo bo med do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di la lkog tu gyur pa dang cig shos kyi ngo bo med do //
translated: Because there is no hidden and other intrinsic reality in this.

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du zhes bya ba ni mi gsal bar snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa de ni rtog pa med pa'i gsal bar snang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du zhes bya ba ni mi gsal bar snang ba'i rnam par rtog pa de ni rtog pa med pa'i gsal bar snang ba ma yin no //
translated: As for ‚Äúbecause of the absence of conceptualization,‚Äù the conceptualization that appears unclearly does not appear clearly in the absence of conceptualization.

original: rtog pa dngos po mi snang phyir ni mi gsal bar snang ba'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pas so //
analyzed: rtog pa dngos po mi snang phyir ni mi gsal bar snang ba'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pas so //
translated: Because of the non-appearance of conceptualization as a thing, it appears unclearly.

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni gsal bar snang ba nyid kyis khyab pa des na 'di nyid 'gal ba'i rang gi ngo bos khyab pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni gsal bar snang ba nyid kyis khyab pa des na 'di nyid 'gal ba'i rang gi ngo bos khyab pa yin la /
translated: As for ‚Äúbecause of the absence of conceptualization,‚Äù it is pervaded by the very appearance of clarity. Therefore, this is pervaded by the contradictory intrinsic reality.

original: de'i ngo bo kho na 'gal ba dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo kho na 'gal ba dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the very essence of that is the observation of the contradictory.

original: ldog pa'i dbye ba med pas bsgrub par bya ba nyid do zhes bya bas rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: ldog pa'i dbye ba med pas bsgrub par bya ba nyid do zhes bya bas rtogs pa ste /
translated: Since there is no division of the opposite, it is the probandum.

original: mngon sum du byed pa kho na rtog pa med pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mngon sum du byed pa kho na rtog pa med pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is only the non-conceptual that is realized, that is, made manifest.

original: gzhan gyi lugs la ltos nas zhes bya ba ni gzhan ni rjes su dpag ba ma 'khrul pa yin par 'dod de tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi lugs la ltos nas zhes bya ba ni gzhan ni rjes su dpag ba ma 'khrul pa yin par 'dod de tshad ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In relation to the system of others means that others assert that inference is non-erroneous because it is valid knowledge.

original: 'khrul pa nyid ni tshad ma min //
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid ni tshad ma min //
translated: It is reasonable to say that error is not valid knowledge.

original: zhes bya ba'i rigs pas de la ltos nas rnam par gcod pa la brten pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i rigs pas de la ltos nas rnam par gcod pa la brten pa yin no //
translated: In relation to that, it is based on exclusion.

original: rang gi gzhung lugs la ltos nas bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rang gi gzhung lugs la ltos nas bstan pa ni /
translated: In relation to our own system, it is taught

original: thams cad du yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad du yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: that it is based on exclusion in all cases.

original: dmigs kyis bsal ba'i sgo nas zhes bya ba ni rab rib bcas zhes bya ba ni dmigs kyis bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: dmigs kyis bsal ba'i sgo nas zhes bya ba ni rab rib bcas zhes bya ba ni dmigs kyis bsal ba yin no //
translated: In relation to exceptions means that the exception is ‚Äúwith visual aberration.‚Äù

original: shes pa thams cad ces bya ba ni zla ba gnyis la sogs pa dag go //
analyzed: shes pa thams cad ces bya ba ni zla ba gnyis la sogs pa dag go //
translated: All consciousnesses means those of two moons and so on.

original: gal te zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i shes pa phyi rol la rnam pa rtog pa yin na dbang po'i shes pa yang de ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i shes pa phyi rol la rnam pa rtog pa yin na dbang po'i shes pa yang de ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: If the cognition of two moons, etc. is a conceptual cognition with regard to external things, then the sense cognition would be the same.üîΩTherefore, it is not included in the direct perception of external things by its very nature.

original: mtshan nyid kyis phyi rol gyi mngon sum bsdus pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni phyi rol la ma 'khrul pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyis phyi rol gyi mngon sum bsdus pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni phyi rol la ma 'khrul pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúit is not mistaken with regard to external things‚Äù is the explanation of the other.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúit is a cognition of a thing as it is‚Äù is the explanation of itself.

original: rang nyid kyi rig pa gzhan bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rang nyid kyi rig pa gzhan bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement ‚Äúit is a cognition of a thing as it is not‚Äù is the explanation of the other.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúit is a cognition of a thing as it is and as it is not‚Äù is the explanation of both.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúit is a cognition of a thing as it is not and as it is not‚Äù is the explanation of neither.

original: ji lta ji lar don bsams pa zhes bya ba'o //üîΩkhyad par zhes bya @64a * //
analyzed: ji lta ji lar don bsams pa zhes bya ba'o // khyad par zhes bya @64a * //
translated: The statement ‚Äúit is a cognition of a thing as it is‚Äù is the explanation of the cognition of a thing as it is.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúit is a cognition of a thing as it is not‚Äù is the explanation of the cognition of a thing as it is not.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúit is a cognition of a thing as it is and as it is not‚Äù is the explanation of the cognition of a thing as it is and as it is not.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúit is a cognition of a thing as it is not and as it is not‚Äù is the explanation of the cognition of a thing as it is not and as it is not.

original: ba ni gang dang cung zad 'brel pa can dmigs nas 'di ni 'dis rnam par gcod pa yin no //
analyzed: ba ni gang dang cung zad 'brel pa can dmigs nas 'di ni 'dis rnam par gcod pa yin no //
translated: The statement ‚Äúit is a cognition of a thing as it is‚Äù is the explanation of the cognition of a thing as it is.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúit is a cognition of a thing as it is not‚Äù is the explanation of the cognition of a thing as it is not.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúit is a cognition of a thing as it is and as it is not‚Äù is the explanation of the cognition of a thing as it is and as it is not.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúit is a cognition of a thing as it is not and as it is not‚Äù is the explanation of the cognition of a thing as it is not and as it is not.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúit is a cognition of a thing as it is‚Äù is the explanation of the cognition of a thing as it is.

original: 'jig rten gyi gzhung lugs la brten nas khyad par can du gtogs pa yin gyi mthong ba'i dngos po gnyi ga bsdoms pa las khyad par can gyi shes pa gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi gzhung lugs la brten nas khyad par can du gtogs pa yin gyi mthong ba'i dngos po gnyi ga bsdoms pa las khyad par can gyi shes pa gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: The statement ‚Äúit is a cognition of a thing as it is not‚Äù is the explanation of the cognition of a thing as it is not.

original: bsdoms pa yang 'jig rten pa'i gzhung lugs ji lta ba bzhin du yin la /
analyzed: bsdoms pa yang 'jig rten pa'i gzhung lugs ji lta ba bzhin du yin la /
translated: The statement ‚Äúit is a cognition of a thing as it is and as it

original: khyad par cung zad ni yan lag yin te /
analyzed: khyad par cung zad ni yan lag yin te /
translated: A part is a specific quality.üîΩThe whole is that which is qualified by the specific quality.

original: khyad par du bya ba gzhan ni yan lag can yin no zhes yan lag dang yan lag can gyi nges pa ni 'jig rten las khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i 'brel pa mngon sum gyis bzung ba nyid yin la yan lag la sogs pa'i nges pa
analyzed: khyad par du bya ba gzhan ni yan lag can yin no zhes yan lag dang yan lag can gyi nges pa ni 'jig rten las khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i 'brel pa mngon sum gyis bzung ba nyid yin la yan lag la sogs pa'i nges pa
translated: The determination of part and whole is established by direct perception in the world, as the relation of the specific quality and the qualified.

original: ni yan lag las so //
analyzed: ni yan lag las so //
translated: The determination of part and so on is from the part.

original: 'di dag tsam ni khyad par can gyi shes pa'i rgyu yin la bsdoms pa'i khyad par gyi shes pa ni 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag tsam ni khyad par can gyi shes pa'i rgyu yin la bsdoms pa'i khyad par gyi shes pa ni 'bras bu yin no //
translated: This much is the cause of the cognition of the specific quality. The cognition of the whole, which is a specific quality, is the result.

original: 'di nyid kyang bya ba dang de dang ldan pa'i dbye bas rnam par brtags pa ni bsdoms nas rtogs pa yin par brjod do //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyang bya ba dang de dang ldan pa'i dbye bas rnam par brtags pa ni bsdoms nas rtogs pa yin par brjod do //
translated: This is also called the cognition of the whole, which is imagined by the distinction of action and that which possesses it.

original: 'di thams cad bsdoms pa la yang yong pa'i cung zang ni 'ga' zhig tu yan lag dang yan lag can gyi ngo bo nyid du sbyar zhing 'dzin par byed pa yin te mi 'dzin na sbyor bar mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di thams cad bsdoms pa la yang yong pa'i cung zang ni 'ga' zhig tu yan lag dang yan lag can gyi ngo bo nyid du sbyar zhing 'dzin par byed pa yin te mi 'dzin na sbyor bar mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even in the cognition of the whole, which is the combination of all of these, a specific quality is sometimes applied and apprehended as the nature of part and whole, because if it were not apprehended, the application would be unreasonable.

original: dbyig ba can gyi rigs pa ni rigs dang / yon tan dang de dang ldan pa rnams la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dbyig ba can gyi rigs pa ni rigs dang / yon tan dang de dang ldan pa rnams la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The reasoning of Dignaga is not applicable to genus, quality, and possessor of quality.

original: gang gi phyir gnyi ga mthong ba dag la ni gcig khyad par du bya ba dang khyad par du byed pa nyid thob na 'jig rten las nges pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gnyi ga mthong ba dag la ni gcig khyad par du bya ba dang khyad par du byed pa nyid thob na 'jig rten las nges pa yin gyi /
translated: Because when both are seen, one is established as that which is to be distinguished and that which distinguishes, and then there is certainty from the world.

original: rigs la sogs pa la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa la ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not so for genus, etc.

original: dbye ba ma mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dbye ba ma mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Because the division is not seen.

original: rigs sogs kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rigs sogs kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is taught by ‚Äúgenus, etc.‚Äù

original: 'di la zhes bya ba ni yul la'o //
analyzed: 'di la zhes bya ba ni yul la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHere‚Äù refers to the object.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni 'di'i rgyu mtshan thog ma med pa'i bag chags yin gyi /
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni 'di'i rgyu mtshan thog ma med pa'i bag chags yin gyi /
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means that the cause of this is beginningless latent impressions.

original: gzhan las ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan las ni 'gyur ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: gzhan las ldog pa'i rgyu mtshan las ni 'gyur ba kho na yin no //
translated: But it is only a transformation from a cause that is a reversal from another.üîΩThe application that precedes the apprehension of difference is not so for genus, etc.

original: tha dad pa 'jin pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi sbyor ba ni rigs la sogs pa la de med pas mi 'gyur ba bstan pa ni rigs la sogs pa ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: tha dad pa 'jin pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi sbyor ba ni rigs la sogs pa la de med pas mi 'gyur ba bstan pa ni rigs la sogs pa ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The teaching of its immutability is ‚Äúgenus, etc.‚Äù

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de dang ldan pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de dang ldan pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes those who possess it and so on.

original: tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i mngon sum la ni 'brel pa med pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir sbyor bar byed pa ma yin te yan lag dang yan lag can gyi yul de ma yin pa'i phyir bstan pa ni tha dad med par snang ba'i phyirüîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i mngon sum la ni 'brel pa med pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir sbyor bar byed pa ma yin te yan lag dang yan lag can gyi yul de ma yin pa'i phyir bstan pa ni tha dad med par snang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Direct perception of difference and non-difference is not a proof because it lacks a related nature, since it is not the object of a whole and parts. This is taught by ‚Äúbecause it appears without difference.‚Äù

original: gal te khyad @64b par can du snang ba la yang dbyig pa can zhes bya ba nye ba'i skyes bu 'brel pa med pa nyid du snang ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te khyad @64b par can du snang ba la yang dbyig pa can zhes bya ba nye ba'i skyes bu 'brel pa med pa nyid du snang ba ma yin nam /
translated: If it is argued: ‚ÄúIn the appearance of a specific object, is not the related person, the one with a stick, not seen as unrelated?

original: de 'di ltar dbyung pa rnam par gcod pa rtogs pa med na khyad par can nyid med pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig bzhin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de 'di ltar dbyung pa rnam par gcod pa rtogs pa med na khyad par can nyid med pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig bzhin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: ‚Äù It is taught that it is not so, because without the exclusion of the one who is not the bearer, the specific object is not cognized, as in the case of the mere object.

original: gal te khyad par la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te khyad par la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is argued: ‚ÄúIn the case of a specific object, etc., is not the person with a stick seen as related to the stick?üîΩ‚Äù It is taught that it is not so, because the stick is not seen as related to the person.

original: sngar mthong ba bsdoms pa ni rtog pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: sngar mthong ba bsdoms pa ni rtog pa ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the combination of what was previously seen a conceptual cognition?

original: bsres pa snang ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bsres pa snang ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not an appearance of a mixture.

original: gang gi phyir 'o ma dang chu la sogs pa'i snang ba ni rtog pa ma yin na ji ltar de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i dogs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'o ma dang chu la sogs pa'i snang ba ni rtog pa ma yin na ji ltar de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i dogs pa yin zhe na /
translated: If the appearance of milk, water, etc. is not a conception, then how could it be the reason for the doubt, ‚ÄúIs it this or that?‚Äù

original: bden te de lta bu'i rnam pa yang mi srid pa yin na //üîΩsbyor ba lta ci smos zhes bya ba'i don du bkod pa yin nam /
analyzed: bden te de lta bu'i rnam pa yang mi srid pa yin na // sbyor ba lta ci smos zhes bya ba'i don du bkod pa yin nam /
translated: It is true that such a form is not possible,üîΩbut it is set forth in order to show that it is not possible for a non-conceptual consciousness to have a specific object.

original: tha mi dad par mthong ba rtog pa ma yin du zin kyang ba lang ngo zhes bya ba ni yin te /
analyzed: tha mi dad par mthong ba rtog pa ma yin du zin kyang ba lang ngo zhes bya ba ni yin te /
translated: Even if seeing without distinction is not a conception, ‚ÄúThis is a cow‚Äù is,

original: khyad par can gyi shes pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: khyad par can gyi shes pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: because it is a consciousness with a specific object.üîΩIf it is said that a consciousness with a specific object is from the realization of a specific object,

original: gal te ba lang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te ba lang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is said, ‚ÄúIf it is ‚ÄòThis is a cow,‚Äô

original: khyad par can gyi shes pa ni khyad par can rtogs pa las so //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi shes pa ni khyad par can rtogs pa las so //
translated: a consciousness with a specific object is from the realization of a specific object.‚Äù

original: de las gzhan du mi 'thad pas khyad par rigs la sogs pa ni dus la sogs pa bzhin du rtogs par byed par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de las gzhan du mi 'thad pas khyad par rigs la sogs pa ni dus la sogs pa bzhin du rtogs par byed par bstan pa ni /
translated: Since it is not tenable as anything other than that, it is taught that the specific object, such as a cow, is what causes the realization, like time, etc.

original: khyad par can gyi shes pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi shes pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the meaning of ‚Äúa consciousness with a specific object.‚Äù

original: khyad par du bya ba'i shes pa la khyad par rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par du bya ba'i shes pa la khyad par rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: A consciousness that has a specific object does not realize the specific object,üîΩbecause

original: gnyi ga rtogs pa la rang dbang yin pa'i phyir khyad par can nyid med par thal bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gnyi ga rtogs pa la rang dbang yin pa'i phyir khyad par can nyid med par thal bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: Because both are realized independently, it follows that there is no difference.

original: de ni 'di yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni 'di yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: This is what it is.

original: gal te dbyug pa nyid la khyad par can nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te dbyug pa nyid la khyad par can nyid yin na /
translated: If the stick itself is the difference,üîΩthen the cognition would be like the person.

original: shes pa la skyes bu lta bur 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la gal te dbyug pa yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: shes pa la skyes bu lta bur 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la gal te dbyug pa yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If the stick is also,

original: dbyug par snang ba'i de ma thag tu skyes bur rtogs pa nyid ni khyad par rtogs pa yin gyi dbyug pa rtogs pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbyug par snang ba'i de ma thag tu skyes bur rtogs pa nyid ni khyad par rtogs pa yin gyi dbyug pa rtogs pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the cognition of the person immediately after the appearance of the stick is the cognition of the difference, not the cognition of the stick. This is the meaning.

original: rigs la sogs pa rtogs pa'i de ma thag pa rtogs pa'i yul nyid pa khra mo la sogs pa ma gtogs pa med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa rtogs pa'i de ma thag pa rtogs pa'i yul nyid pa khra mo la sogs pa ma gtogs pa med par bstan pa ni /
translated: The immediately following cognition of the class and so on is the object of cognition, excluding the variegated and so on.üîΩIf it appears alone,

original: gal te 'ba' zhig snang na ni zhes bya ba ste gtogs pa med pa na khyad par te gzhan las khyad par du byed par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gal te 'ba' zhig snang na ni zhes bya ba ste gtogs pa med pa na khyad par te gzhan las khyad par du byed par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: if it is without inclusion, the difference, the distinction from another, would not occur.

original: rim gyis rtogs pa ma yin du zin kyang khyad par rtogs pa kho na yin na gnyi ga rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: rim gyis rtogs pa ma yin du zin kyang khyad par rtogs pa kho na yin na gnyi ga rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Even if it is not gradual realization, if it is only the realization of the distinction, it is the realization of both.

original: de la yang khyod nyid kyis smras pa'i skyon yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de la yang khyod nyid kyis smras pa'i skyon yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Here, the fault that you yourself have stated is shown:

original: de ste snang ba yin na ni zhes bya ba'o //üîΩkhyad par can gyi shes pa'i yul nyid ces bya ba ni skyes bu gzhan rnam pa bcad nas @65a * //
analyzed: de ste snang ba yin na ni zhes bya ba'o // khyad par can gyi shes pa'i yul nyid ces bya ba ni skyes bu gzhan rnam pa bcad nas @65a * //
translated: If it is an appearance, then...üîΩThe object of a cognition with a distinction, having excluded other persons,

original: skyes bu'i shes pa'i yul nyid kyi shes pa ni rang la yod pa'i khyad par gyis skyes bu gzhan las skyes bu'o zhes rnam par bcad par byed pa'am /
analyzed: skyes bu'i shes pa'i yul nyid kyi shes pa ni rang la yod pa'i khyad par gyis skyes bu gzhan las skyes bu'o zhes rnam par bcad par byed pa'am /
translated: the object of a cognition of a person is distinguished from other persons by a distinction that exists in itself.

original: skyes bu la yod pa las kyang rung ba'i brtags pa gnyis bstan pa ni /
analyzed: skyes bu la yod pa las kyang rung ba'i brtags pa gnyis bstan pa ni /
translated: Or, it is suitable in a person. The two imputations are shown:

original: rang la brten pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang la brten pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That which is based on itself.

original: tha snyad tsam ni yan lag dang yan lag can nyid du zhen pa tsam mo //
analyzed: tha snyad tsam ni yan lag dang yan lag can nyid du zhen pa tsam mo //
translated: Mere convention is mere adherence to the nature of parts and wholes.

original: mngon sum bzhin du snang ba yin na gnyis kyis tshig nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: mngon sum bzhin du snang ba yin na gnyis kyis tshig nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: If it is an appearance like direct perception, it would be the words of both.

original: gnyi ga yang 'brel pa med pa nyid kyis rang dbang du snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gnyi ga yang 'brel pa med pa nyid kyis rang dbang du snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Because both are seen to be independent due to the absence of a connection.

original: tha snyad tsam du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha snyad tsam du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is taught by ‚Äúmerely conventionally.‚Äù

original: ba lang dang yun ring po dang byas pa la sogs pa la ldog pa rtogs pa dang lhag par rtogs pa yang yod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: ba lang dang yun ring po dang byas pa la sogs pa la ldog pa rtogs pa dang lhag par rtogs pa yang yod pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt there also the understanding and the realization of the exclusion of a cow, of a long time, of a product, etc.?

original: gang gi phyir ba khra mo la sogs pa kho na ba lang ma yin par bya ba'i rdzas la ring ba yang ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni ji ste 'gyur na yang yul dang dus la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ba khra mo la sogs pa kho na ba lang ma yin par bya ba'i rdzas la ring ba yang ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni ji ste 'gyur na yang yul dang dus la sogs pa'o //
translated: If one thinks that a cow, etc. is not a substance that is the object of the action of not being a cow, etc., then, although it may be so, it is a place, time, etc.

original: 'ba' zhig snang ba ni sdig ba'i snang ba'o //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig snang ba ni sdig ba'i snang ba'o //
translated: The mere appearance is the appearance of evil.

original: rta la sogs pa las ba khra mo la sogs pa lkog shal la sogs pas mtshan nyid mi mthun pa yin no //
analyzed: rta la sogs pa las ba khra mo la sogs pa lkog shal la sogs pas mtshan nyid mi mthun pa yin no //
translated: A cow, etc. is characterized by a dewlap, etc., which is different from a horse, etc.

original: yun ring ba yang yun ring pa ma yin pa las byed pa'i rdzas nyid khyad par 'gas snang bzhin pa yun ring ba yin no //
analyzed: yun ring ba yang yun ring pa ma yin pa las byed pa'i rdzas nyid khyad par 'gas snang bzhin pa yun ring ba yin no //
translated: And a long time is a substance that is the object of the action of being long, which is different from a short time, etc.

original: rang la yod pa'i khyad par la yang ma rtogs pa'i phyir don la skye bo ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'am rnam par dbye'o zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rang la yod pa'i khyad par la yang ma rtogs pa'i phyir don la skye bo ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'am rnam par dbye'o zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Because of the non-apprehension of the difference that exists in itself, the object is not excluded or distinguished.

original: don gzhan dang ni 'brel pa'am zhes bya ba ni dbyug pa can la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: don gzhan dang ni 'brel pa'am zhes bya ba ni dbyug pa can la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú In connection with another object‚Äù refers to the club-man, etc.

original: rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni ba lang dang yun ring po la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni ba lang dang yun ring po la sogs pa la'o //
translated: ‚Äú In its own nature‚Äù refers to the cow, long, etc.

original: rnam par rtog pa ni de mthong ba sngon du 'gro ba can yin pas de'i yul can nyid yin pa ste de dang bsdoms pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni de mthong ba sngon du 'gro ba can yin pas de'i yul can nyid yin pa ste de dang bsdoms pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Conceptual differentiation is preceded by the perception of that, hence, it is the subject of that, because it is of the nature of that combination.

original: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nyid ni ldog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nyid ni ldog pa ma yin no //
translated: The difference in characteristic is not exclusion.

original: de'i phyir ba lang dang yun ring ba la sogs pa'i rtog pa ni rang bzhin gyi khyad par mthong ba las 'ongs pa brda las byung ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir ba lang dang yun ring ba la sogs pa'i rtog pa ni rang bzhin gyi khyad par mthong ba las 'ongs pa brda las byung ba yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the conceptual differentiation of the cow, long, etc. is derived from the perception of the difference in its own nature, and is conventional.

original: mthong ba'i dngos po sdom par byed pa'i bdag nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mthong ba'i dngos po sdom par byed pa'i bdag nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The fact that it is not of the nature of the combination of the perceived object is demonstrated.

original: de'i phyir gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, if, etc.

original: rjes su 'brang ba lkog shal la sogs pa mngon sum gyi yul ma yin nam /
analyzed: rjes su 'brang ba lkog shal la sogs pa mngon sum gyi yul ma yin nam /
translated: But is not the cow‚Äôs dewlap, etc., the object of perception?

original: rjes su 'gro ba'i ngo bo ni ba lang yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa nyid kyis rtogs pa nyid yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba'i ngo bo ni ba lang yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa nyid kyis rtogs pa nyid yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: The cow is the universal, and the universal is the object of perception, because it is the nature of the universal to be perceived by conceptual cognition.

original: rjes 'gro can gyi rnam shes gang /üîΩ@65b zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes 'gro can gyi rnam shes gang / @65b zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cognition of the universal, etc.üîΩThe word ‚Äúuniversal‚Äù is a tatpurusa compound.

original: sgra ni rjod byed do //
analyzed: sgra ni rjod byed do //
translated: The word ‚Äúsound‚Äù is the means of expression.

original: gsal ba ni khyad par yin te de dag snang bar byed pa la ste zhen pa la 'di'i tshul yod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gsal ba ni khyad par yin te de dag snang bar byed pa la ste zhen pa la 'di'i tshul yod pa'i phyir /
translated: The word ‚Äúmanifestation‚Äù is the qualifier, and the word ‚Äúappears‚Äù is the verb.

original: sgra dang gsal bar snang ba ste /üîΩspyi'i snang ba can ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra dang gsal bar snang ba ste / spyi'i snang ba can ni ma yin te /
translated: The cognition of the universal appears as sound and as a manifestation.

original: gsal bar 'jug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //üîΩ'on te gsal ba nyid mtshungs pa'i rnam pa can ni shes pa des rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: gsal bar 'jug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // 'on te gsal ba nyid mtshungs pa'i rnam pa can ni shes pa des rtogs pa yin la /
translated: It does not appear as a universal, because if it did, it would follow, absurdly, that it would not engage with the manifest.üîΩBut if the cognition has the form of the manifest, then the universal is perceived by that cognition.

original: de nyid de gsal ba'i ngo bo mig gi yul la ste de'i shes pa las so //
analyzed: de nyid de gsal ba'i ngo bo mig gi yul la ste de'i shes pa las so //
translated: That very universal, which is the object of the eye consciousness, is the nature of the manifest.

original: mthong ba med phyir mtshungs pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: mthong ba med phyir mtshungs pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Because there is no seeing, they are the same.

original: mig shes pa ni khyad par nyid du 'dzin pa yin la /
analyzed: mig shes pa ni khyad par nyid du 'dzin pa yin la /
translated: The eye consciousness apprehends the difference,

original: rnam pa rtog pa ni mtshungs pa nyid kyis yin no zhes bya bar ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: rnam pa rtog pa ni mtshungs pa nyid kyis yin no zhes bya bar ni mi rigs te /
translated: but the conceptual consciousness apprehends the sameness.

original: gnyi ga gcig 'dzin par byed pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: gnyi ga gcig 'dzin par byed pa nyid yin na /
translated: If both apprehend the same thing,

original: gnyi ga la ngo bo gnyis snang bar thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa la /
analyzed: gnyi ga la ngo bo gnyis snang bar thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa la /
translated: then it follows that both would perceive the two natures.

original: blo tha dad pa ni khyad par dang spyi'i ngo bo'i nges pa yin la /
analyzed: blo tha dad pa ni khyad par dang spyi'i ngo bo'i nges pa yin la /
translated: The different cognitions are the ascertainment of the natures of the general and the specific.

original: de ni dngos po gcig gis skye ba 'dzin par byed pa nyid yin na mi 'gyur zhing nang gi tshogs pa las 'byung ba de las byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni dngos po gcig gis skye ba 'dzin par byed pa nyid yin na mi 'gyur zhing nang gi tshogs pa las 'byung ba de las byung ba ma yin no //
translated: If they apprehend the arising of a single thing, they would not be different, and they would not arise from the internal assemblage.

original: kha dog la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang de las tha dad pa'i gsal ba'i ngo bo de dag gis khra bor snang ba'i dbang po'i shes pa med do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: kha dog la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang de las tha dad pa'i gsal ba'i ngo bo de dag gis khra bor snang ba'i dbang po'i shes pa med do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: There is no sense consciousness that perceives a multicolored object as having the aspect of color and so on and a different entity of manifestation.

original: snang ba gnyis ni med phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba gnyis ni med phyir ro //
translated: Because there are no two appearances.

original: zhes rtogs pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes rtogs pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the above passage.

original: nang dang phyir rol gyi rgyu'i dbye bas blo tha dad par khas mi len na ni /
analyzed: nang dang phyir rol gyi rgyu'i dbye bas blo tha dad par khas mi len na ni /
translated: If you do not accept that the mind is different because of the difference of internal and external causes,

original: de 'gar yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'grel pa byed pa po'i'o //
analyzed: de 'gar yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'grel pa byed pa po'i'o //
translated: then it would not be so in any case. This is the commentary author‚Äôs.

original: so sor nges pa zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i tshad yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: so sor nges pa zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i tshad yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúDistinct‚Äù means a definite measure.

original: tshad med pa dag la ni tshad med ba'i khra bo la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams la gcig tu mngon par mtshon par byed pa med na blo la gnas pa ma yin pa rnams la brdar byed pa 'am 'dzin pa mi srid par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: tshad med pa dag la ni tshad med ba'i khra bo la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams la gcig tu mngon par mtshon par byed pa med na blo la gnas pa ma yin pa rnams la brdar byed pa 'am 'dzin pa mi srid par bstan pa ni /
translated: In the case of the immeasurable, if there is no single representation of the distinctions of the immeasurable variegated, etc., then it is taught that it is impossible to make or apprehend a convention in regard to those that are not present in the mind.

original: so sor nges pa med pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: so sor nges pa med pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is ‚Äúwithout distinctness.‚Äù

original: 'on te mngon sum gyis gzung ba'i gsal ba las spyi tha dad pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te mngon sum gyis gzung ba'i gsal ba las spyi tha dad pa yin na /
translated: But if the universal is different from the particular that is grasped by perception,

original: rnam par rtog par rung ba nyid mngon sum gyi yul ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog par rung ba nyid mngon sum gyi yul ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: then it is not suitable to be a conceptual object.

original: gsal ba la 'du ba ni spyi'i zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: gsal ba la 'du ba ni spyi'i zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: In response to this, he says, ‚ÄúThe universal is the collection in the particular.‚Äù

original: dbang pos 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir des mtshon pa'i gsal ba 'dzin pa med pas 'brel ba ni brda'i ste /
analyzed: dbang pos 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir des mtshon pa'i gsal ba 'dzin pa med pas 'brel ba ni brda'i ste /
translated: Because the sense faculty does not apprehend, the manifestation indicated by that is not apprehended. Therefore, the connection is the sign.

original: mthong ba med pa ste mi 'dzin pa dang mi byed par gnas pa nyid ni gtso bo'i phyogs la yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba med pa ste mi 'dzin pa dang mi byed par gnas pa nyid ni gtso bo'i phyogs la yin no //
translated: The absence of seeing, that is, the non-apprehension and non-performance, is the primary position.

original: sgra las 'dzin pa yin na ni rnam pa gnyis mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes bstan zin to //üîΩsngar ni rigs la sogs pa rang gi @66a * //
analyzed: sgra las 'dzin pa yin na ni rnam pa gnyis mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes bstan zin to // sngar ni rigs la sogs pa rang gi @66a * //
translated: If there is apprehension from sound, then two aspects would be directly perceived. This has already been explained.

original: ngo bos nges par mi rtog pas de dang ldan pa dang sbyor ba med par bstan nas /
analyzed: ngo bos nges par mi rtog pas de dang ldan pa dang sbyor ba med par bstan nas /
translated: Previously, it was taught that since the class and so on are not ascertained by their own nature, there is no connection with that or application.

original: da ni 'brel pa nges pa mi rtag pa las so zhes bya ba ni kha cig gi'o //
analyzed: da ni 'brel pa nges pa mi rtag pa las so zhes bya ba ni kha cig gi'o //
translated: Now, some say that the ascertainment of the connection is from impermanence.

original: zangs gzhong 'di la rgya shug gi 'bras bu bzhin du snal ma rnams la snam bu zhes bya ba ni 'di la blo'i rgyu mtshan can yin te /
analyzed: zangs gzhong 'di la rgya shug gi 'bras bu bzhin du snal ma rnams la snam bu zhes bya ba ni 'di la blo'i rgyu mtshan can yin te /
translated: Like a jujube fruit in a copper bowl, the cloth is said to be in the threads. This is the basis for the mind.

original: tha dad pa ma yin par grub pa'i phyir phrad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa ma yin par grub pa'i phyir phrad pa ma yin no //
translated: Because it is established as not separate, there is no contact.

original: lhag mas ni 'du ba yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: lhag mas ni 'du ba yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: The rest is the collection.

original: snal ma 'di la snam bu zhes //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: snal ma 'di la snam bu zhes // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The thought is: ‚ÄúThis is cloth, from this yarn.‚Äù

original: de lta bu'i blo ste snam bu'i blo nyid 'jig rten pa'i ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i blo ste snam bu'i blo nyid 'jig rten pa'i ma yin te /
translated: The thought of cloth is not that of the world,

original: gang gi phyir yod pa ma yin pa ni rjes su dpog par byed pa'am 'dzin par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir yod pa ma yin pa ni rjes su dpog par byed pa'am 'dzin par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: because that which does not exist is not inferred or apprehended.üîΩIs the cognition of an ox, which is based on the relation of the beginning of the horn, etc.,

original: rva la sogs pa rtsom par byed pa 'brel pa can nyid kyis ba lang du rtogs pa kho na yin nam de la yang ba lang la rva zhes rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rva la sogs pa rtsom par byed pa 'brel pa can nyid kyis ba lang du rtogs pa kho na yin nam de la yang ba lang la rva zhes rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: only the cognition of an ox? In that case, the cognition is of a horn on an ox,

original: rva la ba lang zhes ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rva la ba lang zhes ni ma yin no //
translated: but not of an ox on a horn.

original: de bstan ba ni ba lang la rva zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan ba ni ba lang la rva zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching is that a horn is on an ox.

original: de lta yin yang 'brel pa ni 'du ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: de lta yin yang 'brel pa ni 'du ba ma yin nam /
translated: Even if that is so, is not the relation the collection?

original: ba lang la zhes bya ba 'di yang de med pa yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: ba lang la zhes bya ba 'di yang de med pa yod pa ma yin la /
translated: The expression ‚Äúon an ox‚Äù does not exist without that.

original: gal te yod pa na rva la yang ba lang zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te yod pa na rva la yang ba lang zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: If it does exist, then the expression ‚Äúox on a horn‚Äù would exist.

original: 'du ba khyad par med do snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: 'du ba khyad par med do snyam du sems pa la /
translated: The relation is not distinguished.

original: ba lang zhes bya ba yang de yin la rva las lhag pa'i yan lag can yang yin pa de dag la rnam par gcod pa med par dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa de lta bu'i blo yin te /
analyzed: ba lang zhes bya ba yang de yin la rva las lhag pa'i yan lag can yang yin pa de dag la rnam par gcod pa med par dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pa de lta bu'i blo yin te /
translated: The cognition is such that it is the basis for the non-exclusion of the cow and the horn, and also for the non-exclusion of the possessor of the parts that are in excess of the horn.

original: de las gzhan pa'i 'du ba ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i 'du ba ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the aggregation that is different from that is not perceived.

original: rnam par mi gcod pa'i rgyu mtshan ni ba lang ngo //
analyzed: rnam par mi gcod pa'i rgyu mtshan ni ba lang ngo //
translated: The basis for the non-exclusion is the cow.

original: rva'o zhes bya ba yang ba lang la rva zhes bya ba'i don dang rjes su mthun pa nyid du rten dang rten can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rva'o zhes bya ba yang ba lang la rva zhes bya ba'i don dang rjes su mthun pa nyid du rten dang rten can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The horn is also the cow, because it is the basis and the dependent that are in conformity with the meaning of the expression the horn of the cow.

original: de bstan pa ni rva la ba lang zhes bya ba ste shes pa yin no //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni rva la ba lang zhes bya ba ste shes pa yin no //
translated: The teaching of that is the cognition that is called the horn of the cow.

original: ba lang la rva zhes bya ba 'di la yang yan lag can rgyu mtshan ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ba lang la rva zhes bya ba 'di la yang yan lag can rgyu mtshan ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching that the possessor of the parts is not the basis in the expression the horn of the cow is as follows:

original: rva la sogs pa'i tshogs las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rva la sogs pa'i tshogs las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The aggregation of the horn and so on.

original: rva dang ba lang la sogs pa dang snal ma dang snam bu la sogs pa mtshungs pa yang ma yin pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rva dang ba lang la sogs pa dang snal ma dang snam bu la sogs pa mtshungs pa yang ma yin pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: It is not the same as horns and cows, etc., or threads and cloth, etc.

original: 'di rnams kyis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: snam bu'i dus na snal ma rnams yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: snam bu'i dus na snal ma rnams yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The threads do not exist at the time of the cloth,

original: 'du byed pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'du byed pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are momentary due to their composition.

original: snam bu'i snga na med pa de gang la yod pa de snam bu'i blo'i yul ji srid du mi skye ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: snam bu'i snga na med pa de gang la yod pa de snam bu'i blo'i yul ji srid du mi skye ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: That non-existence prior to the cloth is of what? It is the object of the cognition of cloth, as long as it does not arise.üîΩThat is what they are.

original: de dag ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba ni log par rtog pas na rgyu ru sgro @66b btags pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba ni log par rtog pas na rgyu ru sgro @66b btags pa yin te /
translated: The superimposition of a cause is due to false imagination.

original: 'bras bu la snga rol du byung ba'i rgyur nye bar 'dogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu la snga rol du byung ba'i rgyur nye bar 'dogs par byed pa'o //
translated: The designation of a cause that occurs prior to the effect is made.

original: snal ma gcig na bkar byas pas //
analyzed: snal ma gcig na bkar byas pas //
translated: When one thread is designated,

original: zhes bya ba ni snam bu'i gnas skabs nyid na phan tshun gcig la gcig gi khyad par las snal ma'i sgra 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snam bu'i gnas skabs nyid na phan tshun gcig la gcig gi khyad par las snal ma'i sgra 'jug pa yin no //
translated: in the state of the cloth, the word ‚Äúthread‚Äù is used due to the mutual difference of each one.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sgra'i zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sgra'i zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The term ‚Äúsound‚Äù is mentioned.

original: snal ma'i sgra'i yul ston pa na yin te bstan pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snal ma'i sgra'i yul ston pa na yin te bstan pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: When the object of the sound of the warp is taught, it is the effect of the teaching.

original: gang gi phyir mtshan nyid kyi don du 'das pa la rgyur sgro 'dogs pas 'bras bu la snal ma'i ming 'jug par byed pa'am re re nas bkar bas kyang ngo //
analyzed: gang gi phyir mtshan nyid kyi don du 'das pa la rgyur sgro 'dogs pas 'bras bu la snal ma'i ming 'jug par byed pa'am re re nas bkar bas kyang ngo //
translated: Because the past is imputed as the cause for the meaning of the characteristic, the name of the warp is applied to the effect, or it is also selected individually.

original: ston pa na rten ni rgyu yin la snal ma'i ming 'jug par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: ston pa na rten ni rgyu yin la snal ma'i ming 'jug par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
translated: When it is taught, the basis is the cause and the name of the warp is applied. This is the opponent‚Äôs position.

original: re re nas bkar ba ni snal ma'i tha snyad 'dogs pa yin na da ltar snam bur tha snyad 'dogs pa'i yul gang yin zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: re re nas bkar ba ni snal ma'i tha snyad 'dogs pa yin na da ltar snam bur tha snyad 'dogs pa'i yul gang yin zhes zer ba la /
translated: If the selection of each warp is the designation of the convention of the warp, what is the object of the designation of the cloth now?

original: phan gdags phan 'dogs te zhes bya ba ste chu dang zhing gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: phan gdags phan 'dogs te zhes bya ba ste chu dang zhing gi ngo bo'o //
translated: It is the benefit and the benefactor, that is, the nature of the water and the field.

original: rnam par chad par ma mthong bas gyon pa la sogs pa'i bya ba byed pa nyid mtshon nam de yul yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rnam par chad par ma mthong bas gyon pa la sogs pa'i bya ba byed pa nyid mtshon nam de yul yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Since it is not seen as separate, the action of wearing and so on is performed. It is applied that the cloth is the object.

original: de kho na dngos po yin te /
analyzed: de kho na dngos po yin te /
translated: That is the entity.

original: dang po brda'i yul nyid kyis ma 'khrul pa'i shes pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dang po brda'i yul nyid kyis ma 'khrul pa'i shes pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: First, because it is the object of non-erroneous consciousness, the object of conventional symbols.

original: 'khrul med ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'khrul med ces bya ba'o //
translated: This is indicated by ‚Äúnon-erroneous.‚Äù

original: gang zhig gang la brdar byas pa de de la dngos po yin zhing cig shos ni dngos su ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig gang la brdar byas pa de de la dngos po yin zhing cig shos ni dngos su ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: That which is conventionally symbolized is a real entity in regard to that, and the other is not a real entity.

original: brten pa gzhan gyi rjes su 'brangs pas zhes bya ba ni yon tan gzhan gyi rjes su 'brangs pas so //
analyzed: brten pa gzhan gyi rjes su 'brangs pas zhes bya ba ni yon tan gzhan gyi rjes su 'brangs pas so //
translated: ‚Äú Following another, the dependent‚Äù means following another, a quality.

original: de 'di ltar phan gdags bya dang phan 'dogs byed nyid la sogs pa'i brda'i rgyu mtshan can gyi snam bu la sogs pa'i shes pa la rigs la sogs pa mngon sum 'ba' zhig gis mi rtogs pa ma yin zhing rjes su dpag pas kyang rtogs pa ma yinüîΩte / rtags med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de 'di ltar phan gdags bya dang phan 'dogs byed nyid la sogs pa'i brda'i rgyu mtshan can gyi snam bu la sogs pa'i shes pa la rigs la sogs pa mngon sum 'ba' zhig gis mi rtogs pa ma yin zhing rjes su dpag pas kyang rtogs pa ma yin te / rtags med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: In this way, in regard to the cognition of cloth, etc., which has as its causal basis the conventional symbol of the relation of the benefited and the benefactor, etc., one does not understand caste, etc. only by direct perception, nor does one understand it by inference,

original: rjes dpag kyang med ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes dpag kyang med ces bya ba'o //
translated: because there is no logical argument. This is indicated by ‚Äúnor is there inference.‚Äù

original: dngos po las zhes bya ba ni chu dang zheng la sogs pa'i dbyi bas kyi khyad par las so //
analyzed: dngos po las zhes bya ba ni chu dang zheng la sogs pa'i dbyi bas kyi khyad par las so //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom the thing‚Äù means from the thing‚Äôs length, breadth, etc.

original: tha dad can ni so so ba la'o //
analyzed: tha dad can ni so so ba la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe different‚Äù means the individual.

original: khra bo la sogs pa'i ba lang nyid dang tsan dan gyi dri zhes bya ba yang gang zhig gang la tha snyad btags pa do da las tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: khra bo la sogs pa'i ba lang nyid dang tsan dan gyi dri zhes bya ba yang gang zhig gang la tha snyad btags pa do da las tha dad pa yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe cow with a variegated coat‚Äù and ‚Äúthe smell of sandalwood‚Äù are also different from the conventional expressions.

original: dbyug ba can lta bu ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: dbyug ba can lta bu ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúIs it not like the man with a club?‚Äù

original: thams cad la yang zhes bya ba'o //üîΩdpung gi glang po che dang nags kyi shing zhes bya ba bzhin du tha dad pa med kyang tha dad @67a * //
analyzed: thams cad la yang zhes bya ba'o // dpung gi glang po che dang nags kyi shing zhes bya ba bzhin du tha dad pa med kyang tha dad @67a * //
translated: ‚ÄúIn all cases‚Äù means in all cases.

original: pa nyid du rtogs pas tha snyad 'dogs pa yin la /
analyzed: pa nyid du rtogs pas tha snyad 'dogs pa yin la /
translated: Just as ‚Äúthe elephant of the army‚Äù and ‚Äúthe tree of the forest‚Äù are not different, but are conceived as different, so they are designated.

original: dbyug pa can zhes bya ba yang 'brel ba can du dmigs pa la brtags pa ste /
analyzed: dbyug pa can zhes bya ba yang 'brel ba can du dmigs pa la brtags pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe man with a club‚Äù is also a designation based on the observation of the connection.

original: kun rdzob pa yan lag dang / yan lag can la brten nas tha snyad 'dogs pa yin gyi mngon sum gyi rtogs bya ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: kun rdzob pa yan lag dang / yan lag can la brten nas tha snyad 'dogs pa yin gyi mngon sum gyi rtogs bya ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to ;
