translated: The meaning is that the conventional is designated in dependence on parts and wholes, but it is not a directly perceived object.üîΩWith respect to the variegated, etc.

original: / khra bo la sogs pa la zhes bya ba ni khra bo'i ba lang nyid ces bya ba'i rgyu mtshan yin no //
analyzed: / khra bo la sogs pa la zhes bya ba ni khra bo'i ba lang nyid ces bya ba'i rgyu mtshan yin no //
translated: means that the reason is the variegatedness of the cow.

original: yan lag dang yan lag can nyid kyi phyir ba lang nyid kyang yod na /
analyzed: yan lag dang yan lag can nyid kyi phyir ba lang nyid kyang yod na /
translated: If cowness exists because of the relation of part to whole,

original: gzhan gyi 'dod pa'i rtag pa'i spyi dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa bzho ba dang dgal ba la sogs pa'i bya ba byed pa nyid ni bya ba de mi byed pa las tha dad pa'i ngo bor 'dod pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi 'dod pa'i rtag pa'i spyi dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa bzho ba dang dgal ba la sogs pa'i bya ba byed pa nyid ni bya ba de mi byed pa las tha dad pa'i ngo bor 'dod pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: then the universal, which is asserted by others to be permanent, is taught to be just the entity that is different from that which does not perform the action of milking, churning, and so on, which is not in accordance with the definition.

original: don dam pa pa'i ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don dam pa pa'i ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The ultimate, etc.

original: ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i shes pa'i rgyu mtshan ni 'jig rten na yang dgal ba la sogs ba nyid ba lang nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i shes pa'i rgyu mtshan ni 'jig rten na yang dgal ba la sogs ba nyid ba lang nyid yin gyi /
translated: The reason for the cognition of cowness, etc. is that in the world, milking, etc. is cowness.

original: gzhan du rtogs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni dgal sogs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du rtogs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni dgal sogs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that it is not realized in any other way is ‚Äúbecause of the word ‚Äòetc.‚Äô.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni tha snyad 'dogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni tha snyad 'dogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äù ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the designation.

original: tha dad pa med kyang tha snyad 'dogs pa yin te /
analyzed: tha dad pa med kyang tha snyad 'dogs pa yin te /
translated: Even though there is no difference, there is a designation.

original: dper na rdzas la sogs pa drug la dngos po nyid dang khang bzangs la sogs pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rigs dang yon tan yang tha dad pa can ma yin te /
analyzed: dper na rdzas la sogs pa drug la dngos po nyid dang khang bzangs la sogs pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rigs dang yon tan yang tha dad pa can ma yin te /
translated: For example, in the case of the six substances, etc., there is no difference in the universal of substance, etc., and the universal of a row, etc., of houses, etc.

original: de ltar tsan dan gyi dri zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang tha dad pa mngon sum ma yin pa nyid du mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar tsan dan gyi dri zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang tha dad pa mngon sum ma yin pa nyid du mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the same way, there is no difference in the case of the expression ‚Äúsandalwood scent,‚Äù etc., because of the similarity of the non-difference of the direct perception.

original: des na khyed kyi nye bar dgod pa 'di ni nye bar dgod pa dang mtshungs par byas ba ma yin bas rigs so zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: des na khyed kyi nye bar dgod pa 'di ni nye bar dgod pa dang mtshungs par byas ba ma yin bas rigs so zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the statement that your designation is not like a designation is reasonable.

original: dngos po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúsubstance‚Äù is the word.

original: de phreng ni de'i phreng ba'o //
analyzed: de phreng ni de'i phreng ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúRow‚Äù is a series.

original: yon tan la ni khyim gyi ngo bo'i phreng pa la'o //
analyzed: yon tan la ni khyim gyi ngo bo'i phreng pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the case of a quality‚Äù refers to a series of the nature of a house.

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni yon tan khyim la yon tan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni yon tan khyim la yon tan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore means because the qualities do not exist in the house.

original: kha cig kyang zhes bya ba ni gsal ba re re zhing yongs su rdzogs pa'i yan lag can bzhin du rigs ni ma yin te /
analyzed: kha cig kyang zhes bya ba ni gsal ba re re zhing yongs su rdzogs pa'i yan lag can bzhin du rigs ni ma yin te /
translated: Some say that the class is not like each individual manifestation, which is complete with all the parts.

original: khyab par 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab par 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it pervades.

original: de'i sgra zhes bya ba ni phreng mang po la'o //
analyzed: de'i sgra zhes bya ba ni phreng mang po la'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúits‚Äù refers to the garland.üîΩThe class is the nature of the garland, and the other garland does not have the nature of the class, so the universal is in the universal.

original: rigs la ste 'bred ba'i ngo bo la phreng ba gzhan rigs kyi ngo bo med pa'i phyir spyi la spyi'o zhes de ma thag pa'i dmigs pa rkyen gang gi yin pa de yod pas mtha' med pa la dmigs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rigs la ste 'bred ba'i ngo bo la phreng ba gzhan rigs kyi ngo bo med pa'i phyir spyi la spyi'o zhes de ma thag pa'i dmigs pa rkyen gang gi yin pa de yod pas mtha' med pa la dmigs pa'i phyir /
translated: Since that which has the immediately preceding object condition exists, it is not tenable that the observation of the infinite is due to the observation of the infinite.

original: 'thad pa ma yin pa ni mi mthun pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i dmigs par rtogs pa ni ma rtogs pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'thad pa ma yin pa ni mi mthun pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i dmigs par rtogs pa ni ma rtogs pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The term ‚Äúunacceptable‚Äù means that the understanding of the complete observation of the dissimilar is simply non-understanding.

original: kha cig tu ni mtha' med par brjod pa dang po'i mtha' @67b can yin te mtha' med pa ni rtogs pa mtha' med pa 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: kha cig tu ni mtha' med par brjod pa dang po'i mtha' @67b can yin te mtha' med pa ni rtogs pa mtha' med pa 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: In some places, it is said to be infinite, and in some places, it is said to be finite.  It is not tenable that the infinite is infinite,

original: rtogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rtogs par byed pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir gzhan du ba'i skyon med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rtogs par byed pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir gzhan du ba'i skyon med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because it is realized.  The fault does not arise that it is not infinite because it is accepted that it is realized.

original: phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba ni dz'a ti'i me tog chen po bzhin du ma 'khrul ba'i shes pa'i yul yin pa ni dngos kho na yin no //
analyzed: phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba ni dz'a ti'i me tog chen po bzhin du ma 'khrul ba'i shes pa'i yul yin pa ni dngos kho na yin no //
translated: The great garland is the object of nonerroneous consciousness, like a great jasmine flower.  It is a real entity.

original: de'i phyir yon tan dang ldan pa'i rdzas yin no zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid la ni rdzas med kyang 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir yon tan dang ldan pa'i rdzas yin no zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid la ni rdzas med kyang 'gal ba med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no contradiction in the definition of a substance that possesses qualities, even though it does not exist as a substance.

original: gang gi phyir pha rol po 'dod pa'i rdzas yan lag las lhag pa ni gzhan du yang dmigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir pha rol po 'dod pa'i rdzas yan lag las lhag pa ni gzhan du yang dmigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Because a substance that is greater than its parts, as asserted by the opponent, is not observed elsewhere,

original: rdzas med pa nyid la rdzas kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdzas med pa nyid la rdzas kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: it is contradictory, because a non-substance does not have the characteristics of a substance. This is the meaning.

original: de bstan pa ni 'di ni legs par byas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni 'di ni legs par byas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The teaching of that is ‚ÄúThis is not well done.‚Äù

original: btags pa ma yin te /
analyzed: btags pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not a designation,

original: 'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa'i yul nyid kyis dngos su ba las khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa'i yul nyid kyis dngos su ba las khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not different from the directly perceived object by virtue of being the object of non-erroneous consciousness.

original: dngos su ba ma yin te /üîΩkhyod kyis khas blangs pa'i tha dad pa'i khyad par nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dngos su ba ma yin te / khyod kyis khas blangs pa'i tha dad pa'i khyad par nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: It is not directly perceived,

original: gtso bo nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gtso bo nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because the difference that you accept does not exist. The teaching of that is ‚ÄúIt is not the primary one.‚ÄùüîΩBecause there is no basis for the designation,

original: nye bar btags pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten du mthong ba'i 'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa'i yul nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten du mthong ba'i 'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa'i yul nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no object of non-erroneous consciousness seen in the world.

original: khyed kyi lta bas kyang rgyu mtshan ni me tog skyes pa'i nags bzhin du don gcig la 'du ba ni phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba 'di la med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: khyed kyi lta bas kyang rgyu mtshan ni me tog skyes pa'i nags bzhin du don gcig la 'du ba ni phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba 'di la med par bstan pa ni /
translated: Even according to your view, the reason is that there is no collection of many things in one object, like a forest of flowers, as in the case of this so-called great garland. The teaching of that is

original: dper na me tog rgyas pa'i nags zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dper na me tog rgyas pa'i nags zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFor example, a forest of flowers.‚Äù

original: phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba ni dngos khyad par med pa'i shes pa'i gzung ba yin yang rgyu mtshan tha dad pa med pa med pa'i phyir btags pa pa yin no zhes khas blangs pa ni dngos su ba 'dod pa la yang khyad par med par bstan
analyzed: phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba ni dngos khyad par med pa'i shes pa'i gzung ba yin yang rgyu mtshan tha dad pa med pa med pa'i phyir btags pa pa yin no zhes khas blangs pa ni dngos su ba 'dod pa la yang khyad par med par bstan
translated: The so-called ‚Äúgreat garland‚Äù is the object of cognition that is not distinguished from the entity, but is imputed because the reason is not non-existent.

original: pa ni / dngos su mngon par 'dod pa yang zhes bya'o //
analyzed: pa ni / dngos su mngon par 'dod pa yang zhes bya'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúthere is no difference in the explicit assertion‚Äù is ‚Äúeven in the explicit assertion.‚Äù

original: dngos su ba gang la rgyu gzhan ma yin pa nyid mthong ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dngos su ba gang la rgyu gzhan ma yin pa nyid mthong ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is said that ‚Äúthe entity is seen to be not another cause,‚Äù

original: tshig don sgra zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshig don sgra zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the meaning of the word is ‚Äúsound.‚Äù

original: rang gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ni dngos po'i zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ni dngos po'i zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúOne‚Äôs own nature‚Äù means ‚Äúof the entity.‚Äù

original: bsil ba'i 'od zer can chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang dngos po'i khyad par gzhan pa ni chen po nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsil ba'i 'od zer can chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang dngos po'i khyad par gzhan pa ni chen po nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúThe great cool-rayed one‚Äù and so on also mean that another distinction of the entity is not great.

original: rgyu mtshan gzhan med kyang gtso bo dang cig shos kyi dbye ba ni grags pa yod pa dang med pa las so zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gzhan med kyang gtso bo dang cig shos kyi dbye ba ni grags pa yod pa dang med pa las so zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Even without another reason, the distinction of primary and secondary is taught from the existence and non-existence of renown.

original: ji ltar grags las grub gang yin //
analyzed: ji ltar grags las grub gang yin //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is established from what is commonly held.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus it is.üîΩ

original: gzhan du na dngos po la med pa'i tha snyad dngos @68a * //üîΩsu bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan du na dngos po la med pa'i tha snyad dngos @68a * // su bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: Otherwise, the expression of non-existence in regard to an entity would beüîΩactual.

original: dngos la'ang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dngos la'ang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is indicated by ‚Äúin regard to an entity.üîΩ‚Äù

original: don yod pa nyid dam zhes bya ba ni pha rol po'i 'dod pa la'o //
analyzed: don yod pa nyid dam zhes bya ba ni pha rol po'i 'dod pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is existent‚Äù refers to the opponent‚Äôs assertion.

original: gzhan du yang zhes bya ba ni kho bo cag 'dod pa 'di la'o //
analyzed: gzhan du yang zhes bya ba ni kho bo cag 'dod pa 'di la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù refers to our assertion.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni grags pa las bzlog pa la ste /üîΩyod pa'i yul can la ni dngos yin la /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni grags pa las bzlog pa la ste / yod pa'i yul can la ni dngos yin la /
translated: ‚ÄúIf it were not so‚Äù refers to the opposite of what is commonly held.üîΩIn the position that the object of an existent is an entity,

original: med pa'i yul can ni dngos su pa ma yin ba'o zhes bya ba'i phyogs la'o //
analyzed: med pa'i yul can ni dngos su pa ma yin ba'o zhes bya ba'i phyogs la'o //
translated: and the object of a non-existent is not an entity,

original: phyin ci log tu zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: phyin ci log tu zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚Äúit would be erroneous.

original: tshig gi don gyi sgra ni btags pa pa yin la dngos po la yang med pa'i sgra dngos su bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: tshig gi don gyi sgra ni btags pa pa yin la dngos po la yang med pa'i sgra dngos su bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚Äù The sound of the meaning of the words is imputed, and the sound of non-existence in regard to an entity would be actual.

original: med pa la yang gtso bo ma yin par 'gyur par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: med pa la yang gtso bo ma yin par 'gyur par bstan pa ni /
translated: It is shown that in regard to non-existence, it would not be primary:

original: rgyu mtshan med par ni med pa la ste med pa'i sgra la nye bar btags pa'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan med par ni med pa la ste med pa'i sgra la nye bar btags pa'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be the reason for the word ‚Äúnonexistent,‚Äù which is applied to nonexistence without a reason.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du grags pa las bzlog pa la ste grags pa med pa ni gzhan du 'gyur na'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du grags pa las bzlog pa la ste grags pa med pa ni gzhan du 'gyur na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means that, as before, the opposite of what is well known is the case, i.e., there is no well known reason.

original: grags pa yang rgyu mtshan gzhan med kyang brda tsam las byung ba yin no zhes bstan pa ni /üîΩgrags pa brda'i rjes 'gro can //
analyzed: grags pa yang rgyu mtshan gzhan med kyang brda tsam las byung ba yin no zhes bstan pa ni / grags pa brda'i rjes 'gro can //
translated: To show that even well known is due to mere convention, even though there is no other reason, it says:

original: zhes bya ba'o //üîΩbrda yang rgyu mtshan gzhan med kyang rig byed la sogs pa'i sde ba sbyor gyi ming bzhin du dang / rang bzhin dang rkyen la sogs pa'i sgra'i cha'i ming bzhin du 'dod pa tsam las byung ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o // brda yang rgyu mtshan gzhan med kyang rig byed la sogs pa'i sde ba sbyor gyi ming bzhin du dang / rang bzhin dang rkyen la sogs pa'i sgra'i cha'i ming bzhin du 'dod pa tsam las byung ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Well known is due to the convention.üîΩTo show that even the convention is due to mere desire, even though there is no other reason, it says:

original: de yang brjod 'dod ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yang brjod 'dod ces bya ba'o //
translated: The convention is due to the desire to express.

original: ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rgol ba la lan btab pa yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rgol ba la lan btab pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúNo‚Äù is the reply to the objection.

original: dper na sdeb sbyor gyi yang yin la sgra'i yin pas sdeb sbyor dang sgra'i'o //
analyzed: dper na sdeb sbyor gyi yang yin la sgra'i yin pas sdeb sbyor dang sgra'i'o //
translated: For example, it is a meter and it is a sound, so it is a meter and a sound.

original: de nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni brda'i ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni brda'i ste /
translated: The very same is a convention, because it is said, The convention is a sound that is accompanied by an intention.

original: gang gi phyir ma rtogs pa la brda med do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ma rtogs pa la brda med do //
translated: Because there is no convention without understanding, it is said, The convention is a sound that is accompanied by an intention.

original: rang bzhin dang rkyen nyid kyang sgra'i chas spyi gsal bar byed pa ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang rkyen nyid kyang sgra'i chas spyi gsal bar byed pa ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
translated: One might think, Aren't the nature and the condition also the general expression of the sound?

original: gsal byed rnam par byed pa med na gsal bya yang rnam par gzhag pa med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gsal byed rnam par byed pa med na gsal bya yang rnam par gzhag pa med par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement, Without the expression, the expressed is not established, teaches that.

original: rang bzhin la sogs pa dag ni rnam par gnas pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin la sogs pa dag ni rnam par gnas pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The nature and so forth are the expression.

original: 'khrul pa mthong bas zhes bya ba ni de med kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pa mthong bas zhes bya ba ni de med kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The statement, Because it is seen as a mistake, is because it exists even though it does not exist.

original: ma he la sogs pa dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i khra mo mthong ba dang ldan pa'i thu yu mthong na /
analyzed: ma he la sogs pa dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i khra mo mthong ba dang ldan pa'i thu yu mthong na /
translated: When one sees a cow that has a pattern that is dissimilar to the pattern of a buffalo and so forth, one thinks, That is a cow.

original: de'o zhes pa rjes su 'jug pa'i shes pa ni brda med kyang 'byung ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: de'o zhes pa rjes su 'jug pa'i shes pa ni brda med kyang 'byung ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't the subsequent cognition, That is it, produced even without a convention?

original: ril po mang po rnams thag ring por mi gsal bar snang ba rnams la de las lhag pa rnams la gzhan ma yin du zin kyang @68b skra shad mang po la lta bu'i snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: ril po mang po rnams thag ring por mi gsal bar snang ba rnams la de las lhag pa rnams la gzhan ma yin du zin kyang @68b skra shad mang po la lta bu'i snyam du sems pa la /
translated: The many wholes that appear without being clearly distinguished at a distance, even though they are not other than that, are thought of as more than that, like many hairs.

original: tha dad kyang gang dngos chos kyi //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad kyang gang dngos chos kyi // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even though they are different,üîΩin the case of those things that are not different,

original: phan tshun mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nyid kyis don de dag ces bya ba mang po'i tshig yin te /
analyzed: phan tshun mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nyid kyis don de dag ces bya ba mang po'i tshig yin te /
translated: the word ‚Äúmany‚Äù is used because of the difference in their characteristics.

original: gcig ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan yang ngo zhes shes par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gcig ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan yang ngo zhes shes par bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that just as one is, so are the others.üîΩEven though they are different,

original: tha dad kyang zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'jug pa'i ngo bo mi snang bas med kyang ngo //
analyzed: tha dad kyang zhes bya ba ni rjes su 'jug pa'i ngo bo mi snang bas med kyang ngo //
translated: the nature of their engagement does not appear, so they are as if nonexistent.üîΩIn the case of those things that are not different,

original: de dag la ni skyed par byed pa dag la'o //
analyzed: de dag la ni skyed par byed pa dag la'o //
translated: in the case of those that produce them.

original: de ltar ni tha mi dad pas so //
analyzed: de ltar ni tha mi dad pas so //
translated: In that way, because they are not different,

original: rtogs par 'gyur ba ni nges par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rtogs par 'gyur ba ni nges par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: they are understood, that is, ascertained.

original: de bzhin ni khra po la sogs pa de dag gi shes pa gzhan dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa rnams ni phan tshun mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ma yin pa rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin ni khra po la sogs pa de dag gi shes pa gzhan dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa rnams ni phan tshun mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ma yin pa rnams so //
translated: Similarly, the cognitions of those, such as the variegated, that are dissimilar to other cognitions are not mutually dissimilar.

original: de ltar nges pa'i rgyu mtshan rnams ni nges de ltar nges par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar nges pa'i rgyu mtshan rnams ni nges de ltar nges par byed pa yin no //
translated: The reasons for that ascertainment are the ascertainers of that.

original: gang gi phyir gzhan las mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i ngo bo'i don gyis skye bzhin pa de la de ltar nges par byed pa yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan las mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i ngo bo'i don gyis skye bzhin pa de la de ltar nges par byed pa yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because of the arising of that which is dissimilar in nature from another, it is ascertained in that way. Therefore,

original: de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa gzhan mtshan nyid mi mthun pa rnams bral ba ste /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa gzhan mtshan nyid mi mthun pa rnams bral ba ste /
translated: it is the exclusion of other dissimilar things that are not its effects.

original: ldog pa'am ldog par byed pa'i ngo bo yin la de'i rjes su 'gro ba ni de'i mngon sum yin pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa ni spyi ma yin pa ste mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldog pa'am ldog par byed pa'i ngo bo yin la de'i rjes su 'gro ba ni de'i mngon sum yin pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa ni spyi ma yin pa ste mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the nature of the distinguisher or the distinguisher itself. Its concomitance is its direct perception, because it is not other than that. It is not a universal, because it is not a direct perception.

original: de bstan pa ni dngos gcig yod ma yin te mngon sum pa'i dngos po ni rjes su 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni dngos gcig yod ma yin te mngon sum pa'i dngos po ni rjes su 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The demonstration of that is: ‚ÄúThere is no single entity that exists,‚Äù because the entity that is directly perceived is not the universal.

original: don la brten pa zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i khyad par gyis /üîΩbde sogs don gyi ngo bo min //
analyzed: don la brten pa zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i khyad par gyis / bde sogs don gyi ngo bo min //
translated: ‚ÄúBased on the object‚Äù means that the object is the basis of the conception of pleasure, etc.

original: zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //
translated: The reasoning is: ‚ÄúPleasure, etc. are not the nature of the object.‚Äù

original: de nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal nyid kyang ngo //
analyzed: de nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal nyid kyang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúThat very‚Äù means ‚Äúsuffering.‚Äù

original: rang bzhin gnyi ga zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gnyi ga zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: ‚ÄúBoth natures‚Äù means the nature of pleasure and suffering.

original: gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi don ma mthong bar nges par 'dzin par byed pa po ni ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi don ma mthong bar nges par 'dzin par byed pa po ni ma yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: The one who does not see the object that has the nature of both is not the one who ascertains.

original: nges par byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges par byed pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAscertainment‚Äù is the same as ‚Äúdetermination.‚Äù

original: rtog pa du ma zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid can gyi dngos po ma mthong ba dang des byas pa'i nges pa yang ngo //
analyzed: rtog pa du ma zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid can gyi dngos po ma mthong ba dang des byas pa'i nges pa yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúMany conceptions‚Äù means the non-seeing of the entity that has the nature of pleasure and suffering, and the determination produced by that.

original: de bstan pa ni bde ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa ni bde ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration of that is: ‚ÄúPleasure, etc.‚Äù

original: byed pa po'i phyogs la rtogs pa yang bstan pa ni /
analyzed: byed pa po'i phyogs la rtogs pa yang bstan pa ni /
translated: The author‚Äôs position is stated in the words, ‚ÄúThe cognition of the object is the establishment of the object.‚Äù

original: sgrub pa yin par rtogs pa la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa yin par rtogs pa la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The cognition of the object is the establishment of the object.

original: de rjes su 'gro ba nyid ces bya ba ni tha mi dad pa'i mchog tu 'dzin pa'i rjes su 'gro ba nyid las so //
analyzed: de rjes su 'gro ba nyid ces bya ba ni tha mi dad pa'i mchog tu 'dzin pa'i rjes su 'gro ba nyid las so //
translated: ‚Äú Following from that‚Äù means following from the non-difference of the object and the cognition of the object.

original: spyi'i don ni dgos pa'o //
analyzed: spyi'i don ni dgos pa'o //
translated: The general meaning is the purpose.

original: de sgrub par byed pa ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: de sgrub par byed pa ni nges pa'o //
translated: The establishment of that is the proof.

original: @69a * // spyi'i dngos po khas len pa yin na 'dzin par nges par byed pa po'i bag chags khas blang dgos so zhes bstan pa ni gang gi rgyu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: @69a * // spyi'i dngos po khas len pa yin na 'dzin par nges par byed pa po'i bag chags khas blang dgos so zhes bstan pa ni gang gi rgyu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If one accepts the general entity, one must accept the latent impressions of the apprehender. This is stated in the words, ‚ÄúThe cause of which.‚Äù

original: bden te / gcig snang cig shos rtogs pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: bden te / gcig snang cig shos rtogs pa kho na yin no //
translated: It is true that the object appears as one and the cognition of the object is of the nature of the object.

original: 'du ba las tha mi dad pa lta bur snang ba ma yin no zhes zer ba ni 'du bas zhes bya ba'o //üîΩ'du bas 'dres pa'i ma yin te /
analyzed: 'du ba las tha mi dad pa lta bur snang ba ma yin no zhes zer ba ni 'du bas zhes bya ba'o // 'du bas 'dres pa'i ma yin te /
translated: It is not that it appears as if non-different from the collection. This is stated in the words, ‚ÄúNot from the collection.‚Äù

original: mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: It is not from the collection, because it is not perceived. This is stated in the words, ‚ÄúNot from the collection.‚Äù

original: ma yin te 'phrod pa 'du ba yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma yin te 'phrod pa 'du ba yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not that the collection is not perceived, because the collection is perceived. This is stated in the words, ‚ÄúThe collection is also perceived.‚Äù

original: rtogs par gyur par mi nus pa ni gnyi ga'i'o //
analyzed: rtogs par gyur par mi nus pa ni gnyi ga'i'o //
translated: The third is neither.

original: gcig po nges la sogs pa gang dag gi 'bras bu yin pa de dag gi ngo bo yin pa ste /
analyzed: gcig po nges la sogs pa gang dag gi 'bras bu yin pa de dag gi ngo bo yin pa ste /
translated: The nature of those that are the effect of the one, the universal, etc., is the same as that of the universal, etc.

original: rtogs pa yod pa nyid do zhes bya ba de dag tsam ni lan yin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa yod pa nyid do zhes bya ba de dag tsam ni lan yin no //
translated: The mere fact that there is an awareness of the universal, etc., is the answer.üîΩThe universal is the effect of the individual,

original: de'i 'bras bu nyid spyi'i yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu nyid spyi'i yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: but the universal is not the effect of the universal.üîΩThe universal is that which is ascertained in each individual, like cowness, but it is not the effect of the universal,

original: spyi'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it does not exist in each individual.üîΩThe universal is not the effect of the individual, because it is not apprehended as different from the individual.üîΩThe universal is not apprehended as different from the individual, because it is not apprehended as different from the individual, like the individual itself.

original: gsal bya re re la nges pa can ni ba lang nyid bzhin du spyi yin gyi de'i 'bras bu nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gsal bya re re la nges pa can ni ba lang nyid bzhin du spyi yin gyi de'i 'bras bu nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: The universal is not apprehended as different from the individual, because it is not apprehended as different from the individual, like the individual itself.

original: re re la med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni ma yin te ba lang nyid du zhes bya ba'o //üîΩtha dad pa mi 'phrigs pa las zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa des khyad par ma nges pa ste /
analyzed: re re la med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni ma yin te ba lang nyid du zhes bya ba'o // tha dad pa mi 'phrigs pa las zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa des khyad par ma nges pa ste /
translated: The universal is not apprehended as different from the individual, because it is not apprehended as different from the individual, like the individual itself.üîΩThe universal is not apprehended as different from the individual, because it is not apprehended as different from the individual, like the individual itself.üîΩThe universal is not apprehended as different from the individual, because it is not apprehended as different from the individual, like the individual itself.üîΩThe universal is not apprehended as different from the individual, because it is not apprehended as different from the individual, like the individual itself.üîΩThe universal is not apprehended as different from the individual, because it is not apprehended as different from the individual, like the individual itself.üîΩThe universal is not apprehended as different from the individual, because it is not apprehended as different from the individual, like the individual itself.üîΩThe universal is not apprehended as different from the individual, because it is not apprehended as different from the individual, like the individual itself.üîΩThe universal is not apprehended as different from the individual, because it is not apprehended as different from the individual, like the individual itself.üîΩThe universal is not apprehended as different from the individual, because it is not apprehended as different from the individual, like the individual itself.üîΩThe universal is not apprehended as different from the individual, because it is not apprehended as different from the individual, like the individual itself.üîΩThe universal is not apprehended as different from the individual, because it is not apprehended as different from the individual, like the individual itself.

original: khyad par rnams mngon sum bzhin du mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩspyi yod pa ma yin pa ni mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par rnams mngon sum bzhin du mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩspyi yod pa ma yin pa ni mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: The universal is not apprehended as different from the individual, because it

original: rnam par dpyad na zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi bya ba la nges par rtogs pas so //
analyzed: rnam par dpyad na zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi bya ba la nges par rtogs pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúWhen analyzed‚Äù means when the activity of perception is ascertained.

original: khra bo la sogs pa'i dngos po nyid ldog pa'i bdag nyid du rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: khra bo la sogs pa'i dngos po nyid ldog pa'i bdag nyid du rtogs pa yin la /
translated: The nature of a variegated entity, etc., is understood to be the opposite of that.

original: des na de'i rnam pa can du bstan pa ni /
analyzed: des na de'i rnam pa can du bstan pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the form of that is taught.

original: 'di la ba lang ngo zhes bya ba'o //üîΩsnang ba'i shes pas yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di la ba lang ngo zhes bya ba'o // snang ba'i shes pas yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThis is a cow.‚Äù

original: mngon sum gyis so //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy the cognition of appearance‚Äù means by perception.

original: dngos po'i rnam pa bag chags kyis bskyed pa yin pa'i phyogs la /
analyzed: dngos po'i rnam pa bag chags kyis bskyed pa yin pa'i phyogs la /
translated: The form of an entity is generated by latent impressions.

original: gal te shes pa de shes pa la sogs pa rgol ba yin gyi tshu rol gyi phyogs ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te shes pa de shes pa la sogs pa rgol ba yin gyi tshu rol gyi phyogs ni ma yin no //
translated: If that cognition is an opponent to cognition, etc., it is not the near side.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dngos po la mi slu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dngos po la mi slu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore means because of non-deception regarding an entity.

original: de'i 'bras bu nyid ni nus pa'am de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa yang mngon sum bzhin du rnam par rtog pas mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu nyid ni nus pa'am de'i 'bras bu ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa yang mngon sum bzhin du rnam par rtog pas mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the result of that itself, or the exclusion of what is not its result, like perception, grasped by conceptual cognition?

original: rnam par rtog pa'i rnam pa ni mngon sum gyis gzung ba bzhin du sgra'i yul la ma yin pa ni bden mod kyi /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i rnam pa ni mngon sum gyis gzung ba bzhin du sgra'i yul la ma yin pa ni bden mod kyi /
translated: It is true that the aspect of the conceptual image is not the object of the word, as is the object grasped by perception.

original: 'on kyang de'i gzung bar zhen par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'on kyang de'i gzung bar zhen par byed pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: However, it is taught that the conceptual image is the object of the word, because it is the cause of the appearance of the word.üîΩThe external is the exclusion of the possible.

original: phyi rol nus pa rnam gcod la //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyi rol nus pa rnam gcod la // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The external is the exclusion of the possible.üîΩThe external is the exclusion of the possible.üîΩThe external is the exclusion of the possible.üîΩThe external is the exclusion of the possible.

original: de'i mthar thug pa rnams la ni phyi @69b rol du ltag par zhen pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: de'i mthar thug pa rnams la ni phyi @69b rol du ltag par zhen pa rnams la'o //
translated: The external is the exclusion of the possible.

original: lhag par zhen pas gzhan sel ba'i yul la yin te /
analyzed: lhag par zhen pas gzhan sel ba'i yul la yin te /
translated: The external is the exclusion of the possible.üîΩThe external is the exclusion of the possible.üîΩThe external is the exclusion of the possible.üîΩThe external is the exclusion of the possible.

original: phyi rol du lhag par zhen pa can ni phyi rol las tha mi dad pa ma yin pa ni mngon sum bzhin du snang ba med pas so //üîΩrtogs pa'i bya bar lhag par zhen par bya ba'i phyi rol mi snang ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: phyi rol du lhag par zhen pa can ni phyi rol las tha mi dad pa ma yin pa ni mngon sum bzhin du snang ba med pas so //üîΩrtogs pa'i bya bar lhag par zhen par bya ba'i phyi rol mi snang ba ma yin nam /
translated: The external is the exclusion of the possible.üîΩThe external is the exclusion

original: blo'i ngo bo ni mngon sum bzhin du snang ba yin yang zhen par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: blo'i ngo bo ni mngon sum bzhin du snang ba yin yang zhen par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the cognition appears like a direct perception, but it is not an object of attachment.

original: phyi rol dang shes pa las gzhan pa'i brjod bya med do snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: phyi rol dang shes pa las gzhan pa'i brjod bya med do snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: The thought that there is no object of expression other than external and cognition is

original: rnam par rtog pa'i gzung ba blo las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i gzung ba blo las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the apprehension of the conceptual, which is other than cognition.

original: 'di la bstan pa ni ma yin te tha dad par snang ba tsam ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la bstan pa ni ma yin te tha dad par snang ba tsam ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is not the teaching, the mere appearance of difference.

original: de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i phyir dang mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i phyir dang mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not the characteristic, because of the difference, and because of the characteristic.

original: lhag par zhen par bya ba nyid kyis snang bzhin pa yin yang phyi rol nyid rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir rab rib can gyis skra shad bzhin du nang gi ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: lhag par zhen par bya ba nyid kyis snang bzhin pa yin yang phyi rol nyid rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir rab rib can gyis skra shad bzhin du nang gi ba nyid yin te /
translated: Although it appears through the nature of attachment, it is internal like the appearance of hair to one with an eye disease, because externality is without a cause.

original: yul rung can gyis mi shes pa //
analyzed: yul rung can gyis mi shes pa //
translated: The object is not known by one who is not fit.

original: rang gis shes phyir de shes yin //
analyzed: rang gis shes phyir de shes yin //
translated: It is known by one who knows it.

original: zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the reasoning.

original: shes pa'i ngo bo nyid 'di kho na bstan pa ni /
analyzed: shes pa'i ngo bo nyid 'di kho na bstan pa ni /
translated: This very nature of consciousness is taught:

original: ldog pa bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ldog pa bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äújust like a reflection.‚Äù

original: don gyi bdag nyid min pa ni zhes bya ba ni don du gnyer bya yin pa'i phyir don te shes pa las gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don gyi bdag nyid min pa ni zhes bya ba ni don du gnyer bya yin pa'i phyir don te shes pa las gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúNot the nature of an object‚Äù means that it is not other than consciousness, because it is the object of desire.

original: 'o na ci zhe na shes pa'i rnam pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na shes pa'i rnam pa kho na yin te /
translated: What is it? It is the aspect of consciousness.

original: thun mong ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thun mong ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not common.

original: phyi rol gyi rang gi mtshan nyid du mngon par zhen pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir 'khrul pa yin pa ci las she na bag chags las byung ba yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rang gi mtshan nyid du mngon par zhen pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir 'khrul pa yin pa ci las she na bag chags las byung ba yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is mistaken because it has as its object the external own-character that is the object of attachment. From what? It arises from the latent impressions.

original: de dang dngos po ni ma yin gyi zhes bya ba ni shes bya'o //
analyzed: de dang dngos po ni ma yin gyi zhes bya ba ni shes bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not a thing‚Äù means that it is not an object of knowledge.

original: dngos po ma yin pa ni shes bya ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po ma yin pa ni shes bya ma yin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not a non-thing‚Äù means that it is not not an object of knowledge.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni zhen par bya ba'i shes bya'am shes pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni zhen par bya ba'i shes bya'am shes pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the object of knowledge or the aspect of consciousness that is to be clung to.

original: shin tu don byed ba'i nus pa'i phyi rol gyi 'jug pa'i yul la ste don byed pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu don byed ba'i nus pa'i phyi rol gyi 'jug pa'i yul la ste don byed pa'o //
translated: It is the object of activity, because it is the external object of engagement that has the ability to perform a function.

original: de don can ni don byed par rtogs pa'i don can no //
analyzed: de don can ni don byed par rtogs pa'i don can no //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúhaving a meaning‚Äù is having the meaning of being understood as a meaning-conferrer.

original: gzhan sel ba zhen bzhin pa ni don byed pa kho na la yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan sel ba zhen bzhin pa ni don byed pa kho na la yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The exclusion of other is only in regard to the meaning-conferrer, because it is in regard to the object that performs a function.

original: shes pa'i rnam pa la shes byar brjod pa'i skyon med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: shes pa'i rnam pa la shes byar brjod pa'i skyon med par bstan pa ni /
translated: The non-erroneous statement that the aspect of consciousness is called the object of knowledge is:

original: sgras don cha ni zhes bya ba'o//üîΩ@70a * // lhag par zhen par bya ba'i gzhan sel ba ni khra bo la sogs pa la rjes su 'gro ba can yin gyi /
analyzed: sgras don cha ni zhes bya ba'o// @70a * // lhag par zhen par bya ba'i gzhan sel ba ni khra bo la sogs pa la rjes su 'gro ba can yin gyi /
translated: The part of the meaning of the word.

original: shes pa'i rnam pa'am shes bya don byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: shes pa'i rnam pa'am shes bya don byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The exclusion of other, which is the object of superimposition, is in regard to the variegated, etc., but not in regard to the aspect of consciousness or the object of knowledge that performs a function,

original: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: because there is no relation. The statement that this is so is:

original: rjes 'gro can sgra zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes 'gro can sgra zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúvariegated‚Äù is a word that has a following.

original: blo las tha dad med phyir ro //
analyzed: blo las tha dad med phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no difference from the mind.

original: zhes bya ba ni blo bzhin du 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni blo bzhin du 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is no relation, like the mind.

original: don tha mi dad du cis mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: don tha mi dad du cis mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If one asks, ‚ÄúWhy is there no difference in meaning?‚Äù

original: mthong ba goms pas zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: mthong ba goms pas zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The answer is: ‚ÄúBecause of the familiarity of seeing.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir dngos ni zhes bya ba ni shes bya ste nang ma yin zhing phyi rol du yang brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos ni zhes bya ba ni shes bya ste nang ma yin zhing phyi rol du yang brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the thing is the object of knowledge, not internal, and not to be expressed as external.

original: gal te shes pa'i rnam pa las byung ba'i sgro 'dogs pa ni shes pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te shes pa'i rnam pa las byung ba'i sgro 'dogs pa ni shes pa yin gyi /
translated: If the superimposition that arises from the aspect of consciousness is consciousness,

original: don gyi ni ma yin na de'i don la mthar thug pa nyid yin pa de la mthar thug par brjod pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: don gyi ni ma yin na de'i don la mthar thug pa nyid yin pa de la mthar thug par brjod pa ji ltar yin zhes zer ba la /
translated: and not the object, how can that which is final in regard to the object be said to be final in regard to it?

original: de dngos te shes pa'i rnam pa'i don to //
analyzed: de dngos te shes pa'i rnam pa'i don to //
translated: That is the thing, the object of the aspect of consciousness.

original: sgro btags pa ni mngon par zhen pa yin la de rtogs pas te /
analyzed: sgro btags pa ni mngon par zhen pa yin la de rtogs pas te /
translated: Superimposition is adherence, and that is realized.

original: rnam pa gzhan las bzlog pa ni don byed pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan las bzlog pa ni don byed pa'o //
translated: The performance of the object's function is the cessation of the other aspect.

original: rtogs byed ni don phyir zhes bya bas don byed pa nyid sgra'i don du brjod do //
analyzed: rtogs byed ni don phyir zhes bya bas don byed pa nyid sgra'i don du brjod do //
translated: The performance of the object's function is expressed as the meaning of the word, by the word arthakriyƒÅ.

original: 'grel pa yang de lta bu'i tshul du bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: 'grel pa yang de lta bu'i tshul du bshad par bya'o //
translated: The commentary should be explained in this way.

original: gal te spyi'i dngos po nges par bya bar cis mi 'gyur zhes zer ba la shes pa sgra yis zhes bya ba ste 'brel pa med par gnas pa'i spyi'i 'dzin pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te spyi'i dngos po nges par bya bar cis mi 'gyur zhes zer ba la shes pa sgra yis zhes bya ba ste 'brel pa med par gnas pa'i spyi'i 'dzin pa yin na /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúWhy not ascertain a universal entity?‚ÄùüîΩIf the apprehension of a universal that exists without a relation is like the apprehension of a pillar, then it would not be conceptual, it would not be false, and it would arise from sound.

original: ka ba 'dzin pa bzhin du rtogs pa can ma yin pa dang / brdzun pa ma yin pa yang sgra las byung bar 'gyur ba dang / don byed pa'i khyad par nyid kyis kyang spyi 'dzin pa yin na brdzun pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ka ba 'dzin pa bzhin du rtogs pa can ma yin pa dang / brdzun pa ma yin pa yang sgra las byung bar 'gyur ba dang / don byed pa'i khyad par nyid kyis kyang spyi 'dzin pa yin na brdzun pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang 'gyur ro //
translated: If the apprehension of a universal is also due to the particular that performs a function, then it would be a false conception.

original: nyid kyi sgra ni nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nyid kyi sgra ni nges pa'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúitself‚Äù has the meaning of ‚Äúonly.‚Äù

original: kha cig na re de'i phyir 'dis rnam pa bzhin du spyi khas blangs kyang don byed par sgro btags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gzhan sel ba'i yul can kho nar brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: kha cig na re de'i phyir 'dis rnam pa bzhin du spyi khas blangs kyang don byed par sgro btags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gzhan sel ba'i yul can kho nar brjod pa yin la /
translated: Some say: Therefore, although a universal is accepted in this way, it is said to be an object of exclusion of other only, because it is superimposed as a performer of a function.

original: nyid kyi sgras snga ma'i gzhan sel ba'i yul nyid la sogs par snang ba nyid du rtogs par byed pa yin no zer ro //
analyzed: nyid kyi sgras snga ma'i gzhan sel ba'i yul nyid la sogs par snang ba nyid du rtogs par byed pa yin no zer ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúitself‚Äù makes it understood that the object of the former exclusion of other appears as itself.

original: 'di la log par snang ba nyid kho na las gzhan sel ba'i yul nyid yin gyi rnam par rtog pa'i don ni med do //
analyzed: 'di la log par snang ba nyid kho na las gzhan sel ba'i yul nyid yin gyi rnam par rtog pa'i don ni med do //
translated: Here, the object of exclusion is nothing but the mere appearance of the opposite, and the object of conceptual thought does not exist.

original: dngos po'i yul can nyid ma yin pa ni spyi'i yul can nyid ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po'i yul can nyid ma yin pa ni spyi'i yul can nyid ma yin pa'o //
translated: The non-existence of an object of conceptual thought is the non-existence of a universal as an object.

original: dngos po'i rnam pa ltar zhes bya ba ni spyi tsam gyi mthar thug pa nyid ma yin gyi de'i rnam pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i rnam pa ltar zhes bya ba ni spyi tsam gyi mthar thug pa nyid ma yin gyi de'i rnam pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúas if it were the form of an entity‚Äù means that the object of conceptual thought is not merely a universal, but rather the form of that.

original: de ltar @70b snang ba med pa kho na gnod pa byed pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar @70b snang ba med pa kho na gnod pa byed pa yod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the mere non-appearance of the object of conceptual thought is the refutation of the existence of the object of conceptual thought.

original: cig shos ni zhes bya ba ni spyi tsam gyi mthar thug pa nyid kyi de'o //üîΩde dngos sgro btags rtogs pa yis //
analyzed: cig shos ni zhes bya ba ni spyi tsam gyi mthar thug pa nyid kyi de'o // de dngos sgro btags rtogs pa yis //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe other‚Äù refers to the object of conceptual thought, which is merely a universal.

original: zhes bya bas rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo don byed pa gzhan las log pa'i bdag nyid du sbyor ba yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya bas rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo don byed pa gzhan las log pa'i bdag nyid du sbyor ba yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe realization of the superimposition of an entity‚Äù shows that the nature of conceptual thought is the superimposition of an entity that is the opposite of the nature of an entity.

original: yang na rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo'i gzhan sel ba ni don byed pa la sgro btags pa yin no zhes rtogs pa'i don can nyid do //
analyzed: yang na rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo'i gzhan sel ba ni don byed pa la sgro btags pa yin no zhes rtogs pa'i don can nyid do //
translated: Or else, the meaning of the statement ‚Äúthe form of a conceptual image‚Äù is that the exclusion of other, which is the nature of a conceptual cognition, is a superimposition of the performance of an action.

original: gal te rang gi ngo bos zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnas skabs kho na la yongs su dpyod par byed do //
analyzed: gal te rang gi ngo bos zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnas skabs kho na la yongs su dpyod par byed do //
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is by nature‚Ä¶‚Äù and so on is an analysis of the situation.

original: rang gi 'dod pas zhen par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rang gi 'dod pas zhen par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement ‚Äúby their own desire‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: de'i tha snyad kyi yul nyid du rnam par 'jog pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tha snyad kyi yul nyid du rnam par 'jog pa'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is the presentation of the object of that convention.

original: gzhan gyi ming gzhan du tha snyad byed pa ni rigs 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ming gzhan du tha snyad byed pa ni rigs 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: The convention of one thing in relation to another is a mistake.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni nya phyis la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni nya phyis la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that‚Ä¶‚Äù refers to mother-of-pearl.

original: rang bzhin gzhan du dngul du sgro btags pa'o zhes bya ste pha rol po'i 'dod pa'o //üîΩshes pa gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don ni gzhan gyi shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gzhan du dngul du sgro btags pa'o zhes bya ste pha rol po'i 'dod pa'o // shes pa gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don ni gzhan gyi shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The superimposition of silver in place of its nature is the opponent‚Äôs belief.üîΩThe meaning of ‚Äúbecause it is a different cognition‚Äù is because it is a different cognition.

original: des zhes bya ba ni shes pa gzhan gyis so //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni shes pa gzhan gyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy that‚Ä¶‚Äù means by a different cognition.

original: de'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni lhag par sgro btags bzhin pa'i dngul la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni lhag par sgro btags bzhin pa'i dngul la sogs pa'o //
translated: The nature of that is silver, etc., which is imagined to be something more than it is.

original: de lta'o zhe na zhes bya ba'i yod do zhe na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta'o zhe na zhes bya ba'i yod do zhe na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you say that it is, then it is.

original: gang la zhes bya ba ni nya phyis la sogs pa la'o //üîΩde la zhes bya ba ni nya phyis la'o //
analyzed: gang la zhes bya ba ni nya phyis la sogs pa la'o // de la zhes bya ba ni nya phyis la'o //
translated: In regard to what? In regard to mother-of-pearl, etc.üîΩIn that, i.e., in mother-of-pearl.

original: de zhes bya ba ni dngul lo //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni dngul lo //
translated: That, i.e., silver.

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni skyes pa gzhan gyis so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni skyes pa gzhan gyis so //
translated: By another, i.e., by another man.

original: nya phyis rig pa ni yul ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: nya phyis rig pa ni yul ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: The cognition of mother-of-pearl is not the object, because it does not appear.üîΩThe opponent‚Äôs opinion is that the cognition of silver arises from the impaired sense faculty.üîΩThe cognition of silver arises from the impaired sense faculty.üîΩThe cognition of silver arises from the impaired sense faculty.üîΩThe cognition of silver arises from the impaired sense faculty.

original: de'i ni dngul gyis te de'i tshe nyid yod pa'o //üîΩthob par bya ba med pa'i phyir tha snyad mi byed do zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: de'i ni dngul gyis te de'i tshe nyid yod pa'o // thob par bya ba med pa'i phyir tha snyad mi byed do zhes zer ba ni /
translated: The cognition of silver arises from the impaired sense faculty.

original: 'on te thob par bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te thob par bya ba'o //
translated: The cognition of

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i rnam pa la phyi rol gyi tha snyad du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i rnam pa la phyi rol gyi tha snyad du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means because the aspect of consciousness is designated as external.

original: de'i nang 'di ltar tha snyad kyi dus su sgra las don gyi khyad par gyi gzhan sel ba rtogs pa'i phyir brda yang de'i don gyi khyad par gyi bdag nyid kho na la yang sgra'i byas pa yin no zhes shes pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i nang 'di ltar tha snyad kyi dus su sgra las don gyi khyad par gyi gzhan sel ba rtogs pa'i phyir brda yang de'i don gyi khyad par gyi bdag nyid kho na la yang sgra'i byas pa yin no zhes shes pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: At the time of convention, since one understands the exclusion of other with regard to the features of the object from the word, one understands that the convention is the function of the word with regard to the features of the object alone.

original: de'i phyir tha snyad kyi dus na gzhan sel ba'i bdag nyid kyi khyad par rtogs pa'i phyir bstan pa'i don to //

original: de'i phyir 'di lta bu'i 'jug pa'i yul dang de'i bdag nyid kyis bsdus pa'i gzhan sel ba'i bdag nyid kyi don byed pa'i khyad par ni brjod bya nyid kyi sgras 'brel par byed pa yin gyi spyi ma yin /

translated: Therefore, the particular activity of the exclusion of other, which is included in the domain of such engagement and in its nature, is connected by the word with the very thing to be expressed, not with a universal.

analyzed: spyi ma yin zhing shes ba'i don yang ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: de'i khyad par thams cad la mthong @71b na'o zhes brjod do //

analyzed: de'i nye bar bstan pa kho nas 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
