analyzed: khyad par gyi rim pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par nyid kyi'o //
translated: The order of the particular is the order of the particular itself.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni phyogs snga ma dgag pa'o //
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba ni phyogs snga ma dgag pa'o //
translated: No, the opponent‚Äôs position is rejected.

original: der yang zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la yang ngo //
analyzed: der yang zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs la yang ngo //
translated: Also there, in the case of the inference for the sake of another,

original: rigs la sogs pa yang yin la de dang ldan pa yang yin pa'o //
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa yang yin la de dang ldan pa yang yin pa'o //
translated: the reason is the property of the inferential subject, the property-possessor, and the pervasion.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni gzhan las ldog pa nyid la zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni gzhan las ldog pa nyid la zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: Therefore, the exclusion of other is the meaning of the reason.

original: gzhan @72b mthong bas zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis rtogs pas so //
analyzed: gzhan @72b mthong bas zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis rtogs pas so //
translated: By seeing other, by understanding other.

original: de'i phyir rtog pa med pa nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i ngo bo'i phrad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rtog pa med pa nyid kyang zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i ngo bo'i phrad pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the absence of conception also, of that kind, is the contact.

original: de nyid la zhes bya ba de'i ngo bor snang ba nyid du bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid la zhes bya ba de'i ngo bor snang ba nyid du bstan pa yin te /
translated: In that, in the form of that, the appearance itself is shown.

original: rtog pa'i rtags la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa'i rtags la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it depends on the sign of conception.

original: gnyi ga'i las skyes pa ni stobs 'gyed pa gnyis la'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i las skyes pa ni stobs 'gyed pa gnyis la'o //
translated: Arisen from both actions, from the two strengths.

original: gang yang rung ba'i las las skyes pa ni mtho yor dang khra dag la'o //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba'i las las skyes pa ni mtho yor dang khra dag la'o //
translated: That which arises from any action is a scarecrow and a painting.

original: phrad pa las skyes pa ni rgyu nam mkha'i phrad pa las skyes pa ste 'bras bu'i nam mkha'i phrad pa'o //
analyzed: phrad pa las skyes pa ni rgyu nam mkha'i phrad pa las skyes pa ste 'bras bu'i nam mkha'i phrad pa'o //
translated: That which arises from contact is the contact of the cause of space, which arises from the contact of the effect of space.

original: de ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba ni bar mtshams med pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba ni bar mtshams med pa'o //
translated: That which is called ‚Äúsuch‚Äù is without interval.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni bar mtshams dang bcas pa'i snga ma'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni bar mtshams dang bcas pa'i snga ma'o //
translated: That which is called ‚Äúthat‚Äù is the previous with interval.üîΩThat which is called ‚Äúcontact‚Äù is seen without interval.

original: phrad pa zhes bya ba ni bar mtshams med par mthong bar 'gyur ba'o zhes ni de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: phrad pa zhes bya ba ni bar mtshams med par mthong bar 'gyur ba'o zhes ni de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: Such is the conceptualization.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni bar mtshams med pa'i gnas skabs las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni bar mtshams med pa'i gnas skabs las so //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom that‚Äù means from the state without interval.

original: 'di la bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'di la bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching here is:

original: snga ma dang zhes bya ba ste bar mtshams dang bcas pa nyid bar mtshams med pa zhes bya bar ni mngon sum ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snga ma dang zhes bya ba ste bar mtshams dang bcas pa nyid bar mtshams med pa zhes bya bar ni mngon sum ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúThe previous‚Äù means that with interval is called without interval. It is not directly perceived.

original: gcig gis zhes bya ba ni 'di dag las gcig gis so //
analyzed: gcig gis zhes bya ba ni 'di dag las gcig gis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy one‚Äù means by one of these.

original: bya ba 'di'i dgos pa yin no //
analyzed: bya ba 'di'i dgos pa yin no //
translated: This is the purpose of this activity.

original: bar mtshams med par 'byung ba yin du zin kyang gzhan du mi ltos pa la ltos pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bar mtshams med par 'byung ba yin du zin kyang gzhan du mi ltos pa la ltos pa'i phyir /
translated: Even though it occurs without a break, it is a subject that has an object that is an other-exclusion because it is dependent on what is not other.

original: gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin la khyad par nyid la brda yin no //
analyzed: gzhan sel ba'i yul can yin la khyad par nyid la brda yin no //
translated: And the sign is in the specific itself.

original: gcig tu nges pa med pa nyid kyis de'i yul can ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gcig tu nges pa med pa nyid kyis de'i yul can ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Since there is no ascertainment of one, it is not the subject of that. Therefore,

original: brda'i snga rol na sgra med kyang don mthong ba yin yang de dran pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: brda'i snga rol na sgra med kyang don mthong ba yin yang de dran pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: even though the object is seen prior to the sign, it is not a memory of that.

original: brda phrad pa'i rgyu can gyi zhes bya ba ste de med na sngar byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: brda phrad pa'i rgyu can gyi zhes bya ba ste de med na sngar byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is taught by ‚Äúhaving the sign as its cause,‚Äù because if that does not exist, it does not occur prior.

original: 'grel par ni dran pa yod na 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'dis mthong ba las phyi ma yang rtog pa med par smra ba yin no //
analyzed: 'grel par ni dran pa yod na 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'dis mthong ba las phyi ma yang rtog pa med par smra ba yin no //
translated: In the Commentary, ‚Äúif there is memory‚Äù means that even after seeing, there is no conception.

original: de'i rjes su 'brang ba ni dbang po'i rjes su 'brang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes su 'brang ba ni dbang po'i rjes su 'brang ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFollowing that‚Äù is following the sense faculty.

original: de las gzhan pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ni shes pa snga ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ni shes pa snga ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFollowing that which is other than that‚Äù is following the previous consciousness.

original: de'i rjes su 'brang ba yin zhes bya ba ni dbang po'i rjes su 'brang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes su 'brang ba yin zhes bya ba ni dbang po'i rjes su 'brang ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt follows after that‚Äù means it follows after the sense faculty.

original: mngon sum pa'i dang po la gang yin zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang lhan cig pa nyid do //
analyzed: mngon sum pa'i dang po la gang yin zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang lhan cig pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúWhich is the first of the direct perceptions‚Äù means it is simultaneous with the former.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni snga ma'i'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni snga ma'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù means the former.

original: 'di dang zhes bya ba ni snang bzhin pa dang ngo //üîΩ'di de dang zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang ngo //
analyzed: 'di dang zhes bya ba ni snang bzhin pa dang ngo // 'di de dang zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù means the present one.üîΩ‚ÄúThat‚Äù means the former.

original: 'di zhes bya @73a * //üîΩba ni snang bzhin ba'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya @73a * // ba ni snang bzhin ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù means the present one.

original: de dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gcig dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gcig dang ldan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEndowed with that‚Äù means endowed with one.

original: rang brgyud pa zhes bya ba ni gcig pa'o //
analyzed: rang brgyud pa zhes bya ba ni gcig pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIndependent‚Äù means alone.

original: gzhan du 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni de dang ldan la brten pa nyid kyis 'dzin pa yin na'o //
analyzed: gzhan du 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni de dang ldan la brten pa nyid kyis 'dzin pa yin na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúGrasping the other‚Äù means if it is grasping by the mere fact of being endowed with that.

original: brda'i snga rol gyi de dran pa'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa ni de med pa mi 'byung ba yin gyi phyis 'byung ba ni de las byung ba'i phyir rnam par rtog pa can kho nar 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: brda'i snga rol gyi de dran pa'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa ni de med pa mi 'byung ba yin gyi phyis 'byung ba ni de las byung ba'i phyir rnam par rtog pa can kho nar 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la /
translated: You think that the conceptual thought that has the nature of remembering the sign prior to the sign does not arise without it, but that which arises later does arise from it, and therefore it is conceptual.

original: de'i tshe na yang rnam par rtog pa gzhan yod kyang byung ba ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i don mthong ba ni /
analyzed: de'i tshe na yang rnam par rtog pa gzhan yod kyang byung ba ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i don mthong ba ni /
translated: Even at that time, although another conceptual thought exists, the seeing of a nonconceptual object

original: rnam par rtog pa can nyid dang 'gal bas cig car mi rigs par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa can nyid dang 'gal bas cig car mi rigs par bstan pa ni /
translated: arises. Since it is contradictory for that which is conceptual to be simultaneous, it is taught:

original: gzhan ba ni snang bzhin pa ni snang bzhin pa la 'jug pa'i sems kyi rnam rtog gang gi yin pa de yang 'gal ba'i rnam rtog mngon du byed na /
analyzed: gzhan ba ni snang bzhin pa ni snang bzhin pa la 'jug pa'i sems kyi rnam rtog gang gi yin pa de yang 'gal ba'i rnam rtog mngon du byed na /
translated: If one engages in a conceptual thought that is different from the object that appears,

original: rta la rtog par byed pa na yang ba lang mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: rta la rtog par byed pa na yang ba lang mthong ba yin no //
translated: then when one conceives of a horse, one sees an ox.

original: de yang 'di yin la brda'i dus su 'byung ba'i sgra ni de'i brda yin la /
analyzed: de yang 'di yin la brda'i dus su 'byung ba'i sgra ni de'i brda yin la /
translated: Moreover, if the sign that occurs at the time of the sign is the sign of that,üîΩthen the sign that occurs at the time of the sign is the sign of that.

original: de mi 'dzin pa ni de la rnam par rtog pa gzhan mngon du phyogs pa yod pa na gsal ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: de mi 'dzin pa ni de la rnam par rtog pa gzhan mngon du phyogs pa yod pa na gsal ba kho na yin no //
translated: The non-apprehension of that is the clear apprehension of the other conceptualization that is present.

original: de 'dzin pa las byung ba ni /
analyzed: de 'dzin pa las byung ba ni /
translated: The arising from the apprehension of that is

original: des bskyed pa'i rtog pa yin la de med na mi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des bskyed pa'i rtog pa yin la de med na mi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the conceptualization generated by that, and the meaning is that it does not occur without that.üîΩWhen there is the presence of another conceptualization,

original: rnam par rtog bzhin pa nyid na zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa gzhan mngon du phyogs pa yod na'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog bzhin pa nyid na zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa gzhan mngon du phyogs pa yod na'o //
translated: that is the state of conceptualization.

original: der yang dbang po la lhan cig byed pa dran pa med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: der yang dbang po la lhan cig byed pa dran pa med par bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration that memory is not a simultaneous cause of the sense faculty is

original: gang zhig gang gi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúthat which is of that . . . ‚Äù

original: gal te dbang po'i bskyed pa'i 'bras bu tsam rtog pa med pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te dbang po'i bskyed pa'i 'bras bu tsam rtog pa med pa yin na /
translated: If the mere effect generated by the sense faculty is non-conceptual,

original: de dran pa'i lhan cig byed pa yod na yang rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dran pa'i lhan cig byed pa yod na yang rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid du mi 'gyur te /
translated: then even when the simultaneous cause of memory is present, it would not become the nature of conceptualization.

original: 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration that this is contradictory is

original: gzhan du na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúotherwise . . . ‚Äù

original: sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa tshad ma nyid ma yin la sngon po dang ser po so sor dmigs kyang lhan cig dmigs pa ni gcig nyid du gyur par bshad zin par bstan pa ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa tshad ma nyid ma yin la sngon po dang ser po so sor dmigs kyang lhan cig dmigs pa ni gcig nyid du gyur par bshad zin par bstan pa ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply to that is: ‚ÄúIt is not a valid cognition that recognizes what was seen before. Although blue and yellow are individually observed, it is explained that simultaneous observation is just one.‚Äù

original: lkog tu gyur ba'i rnam par rtog pa khas len na mi dmigs pa rtogs par byed pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: lkog tu gyur ba'i rnam par rtog pa khas len na mi dmigs pa rtogs par byed pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: If you think that when a hidden object is accepted, non-observation does not establish it,

original: ji ste dmigs kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ste dmigs kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then the reply is: ‚ÄúEven if it is observed‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: rnam par rtog pas khyab pa'i tha snyad du bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas khyab pa'i tha snyad du bstan pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the pervasion by conception is:

original: rnam par rtog pa med par ni zhes @73b bya ba'o //üîΩde'i tshe zhes bya ba ni du ba las me rjes su dpog pa'i tshe na'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med par ni zhes @73b bya ba'o // de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni du ba las me rjes su dpog pa'i tshe na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout conception‚Ä¶‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúAt that time‚Äù means when inferring fire from smoke.

original: rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba 'di bar du chod pa'i me du ba las rjes su dpog bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba 'di bar du chod pa'i me du ba las rjes su dpog bzhin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúInference‚Äù is the interrupted fire being inferred from smoke.

original: lag pas reg pas grang ba la sogs pa de las gzhan pa'i me la brten na tha snyad rung ba gzhan des rtogs pa de'i phyir the tshom gyi yul ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lag pas reg pas grang ba la sogs pa de las gzhan pa'i me la brten na tha snyad rung ba gzhan des rtogs pa de'i phyir the tshom gyi yul ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not the object of doubt, because it is understood by another convention that is suitable when in dependence on another fire that is different from that one, such as the one that is cold when touched by the hand.

original: dang po'i rjes su dpag pa bzhin du reg pa la sogs pa'i rjes su dpag pa la yang rigs pa mtshungs pa'i phyir the tshom du mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dang po'i rjes su dpag pa bzhin du reg pa la sogs pa'i rjes su dpag pa la yang rigs pa mtshungs pa'i phyir the tshom du mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: Because the reasoning is the same in the case of an inference of touch, etc., as it is in the case of the first inference, it is shown that there is no doubt.

original: reg shes zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: reg shes zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression ‚Äúthe consciousness of touch‚Äù is used.

original: blo sngon du btang nas byas pa zhes bya bas ni dngos po dang 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: blo sngon du btang nas byas pa zhes bya bas ni dngos po dang 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: The expression ‚Äúhaving been produced by the prior mind‚Äù indicates that it is not related to a thing.

original: mi'i rjes su dpog pa dang mtshungs pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rjes su dpag pa ni snang du rung bar rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa rnams rang rig pa nyid kyis so zhes bstan pa ni /üîΩde ltar rtog pa'i sgrub byed min //
analyzed: mi'i rjes su dpog pa dang mtshungs pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rjes su dpag pa ni snang du rung bar rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa rnams rang rig pa nyid kyis so zhes bstan pa ni / de ltar rtog pa'i sgrub byed min //
translated: The inference of a conceptual thought that is not similar to the inference of a human is by means of the self-awareness of the conceptual thoughts, because they have a single nature that is suitable to appear. This is indicated by the line:

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThus, it is not the proof of a conceptual thought.‚Äù

original: 'di la goms pa med pa'i phyir goms pa med pa ste skyes bu'i ni 'gyur min zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'di la goms pa med pa'i phyir goms pa med pa ste skyes bu'i ni 'gyur min zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: Because it is not habituated to this, it is not habituated. This is to be connected with ‚Äúthe person‚Äôs is not changeable.‚Äù

original: de nyid du 'gyur ba ni goms pa dang ldan pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de nyid du 'gyur ba ni goms pa dang ldan pa nyid yin no //
translated: To be habituated to this is to be habituated to that.

original: med par yang zhes bya ba ni dpyod pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: med par yang zhes bya ba ni dpyod pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Also, without‚Äù refers to analysis, etc.

original: mthong ba de dag la zhes bya ba ni de kho na ltar mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mthong ba de dag la zhes bya ba ni de kho na ltar mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚Äú In regard to those who see‚Äù means that they see it just as it is.

original: gal te mi 'dzin na zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: gal te mi 'dzin na zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: This is to be connected with ‚Äúif it does not apprehend.‚Äù

original: rtog pa med pa yod pa ni bden mod kyi de ni tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: rtog pa med pa yod pa ni bden mod kyi de ni tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: ‚Äú It is true that there is non-conceptual cognition, but it is not a valid cognition.

original: nges pa med pas nges par gzung ba'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa med pas nges par gzung ba'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not definite, it is not a definite apprehension of an object.

original: nges pa skyed par byed pa nyid kyis ni mig la sogs pa bzhin du btags pa'i tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: nges pa skyed par byed pa nyid kyis ni mig la sogs pa bzhin du btags pa'i tshad ma yin no //
translated: It is a valid cognition by designation, like the eye, etc., because it generates certainty.

original: gang gi tshe mthong ba'i don la yang nges pa skyed pa ma yin pa de'i tshe tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe mthong ba'i don la yang nges pa skyed pa ma yin pa de'i tshe tshad ma yin te /
translated: When it does not generate certainty even in regard to the object that is seen, then it is not a valid cognition.

original: gzhal bya nges par mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: gzhal bya nges par mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la /
translated: because it does not definitely apprehend the object.

original: nges pas kyang 'di ni yul du rnam par 'jog pa'i yul brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: nges pas kyang 'di ni yul du rnam par 'jog pa'i yul brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: In order to demonstrate that even by means of ascertainment, the object is described as the object that is determined, he says:

original: gzugs zhes mthong ba na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzugs zhes mthong ba na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúWhen one sees ‚Äòform,‚Äô etc.‚Äù

original: rtogs pa ni bdag nyid la mi rtag pa nyid du 'jog par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtogs pa ni bdag nyid la mi rtag pa nyid du 'jog par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúRealization‚Äù means that one determines it as impermanent in relation to oneself.

original: ji ltar mthong zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang gis te rtog pas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar mthong zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang gis te rtog pas ni ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúHow is it seen?‚Äù means ‚ÄúBy what mode?‚Äù It is not by means of conceptualization,

original: gang gi phyir phyi rol gyi rnam par rtog par byed na rang nyid la rnam par rtog pa mi srid de 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir phyi rol gyi rnam par rtog par byed na rang nyid la rnam par rtog pa mi srid de 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because if one conceptualizes externally, it is impossible for it to be conceptualized in relation to oneself, because that would be contradictory.

original: rtog pa med pa yin na de ltar rang nyid la phyi rol du rnam par @74a * //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa yin na de ltar rang nyid la phyi rol du rnam par @74a * //
translated: If it is not conceptualization, then even though it conceptualizes externally in that way, it does not ascertain.

original: rtog par byed kyang nges par byed pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa la nyams su myong ba yang yod ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: rtog par byed kyang nges par byed pa ma yin no snyam du sems pa la nyams su myong ba yang yod ces bya ba ste /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says, ‚ÄúThere is also experience.‚Äù

original: 'di'i nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid kyis nges pa gzung ba ni nges pa med kyang yod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid kyis nges pa gzung ba ni nges pa med kyang yod pa yin te /
translated: The ascertainment by the nature of experience of this is not ascertained, but it is existent.

original: de med na yod pa nyid kho na ni bsgrub par dka' zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de med na yod pa nyid kho na ni bsgrub par dka' zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If it did not exist, it would be difficult to establish that it is existent.

original: rigs pa'i ngo bo'i rtog pa la bdag nyid dang bdag nyid ma yin pa la yang rung ba de nyid rnam par rtog pa can nyid du 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rigs pa'i ngo bo'i rtog pa la bdag nyid dang bdag nyid ma yin pa la yang rung ba de nyid rnam par rtog pa can nyid du 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The nature of reasoning is conceptual, and it is the same whether it is in itself or not. It is contradictory to be conceptual.

original: de nyid kyis myong ba yin na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis myong ba yin na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it were the same as experience,

original: gcig nyid ni rim pa ma yin pas khyab pa yin pa dang rim pa dang 'gal ba'i khyab pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gcig nyid ni rim pa ma yin pas khyab pa yin pa dang rim pa dang 'gal ba'i khyab pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Singularity is pervaded by non-sequence, and sequence is pervaded by contradiction.

original: gal te blo gcig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te blo gcig ces bya ba'o //
translated: If the mind were one,

original: de yang ni rim pa ma yin pa yang ngo //
analyzed: de yang ni rim pa ma yin pa yang ngo //
translated: It would also be non-sequential.

original: thug pa med pa zhes bya ba ni gcig nyid dang rim pa 'gal ba khyab pa yin no zhes bya ba de nyid slar 'khor ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thug pa med pa zhes bya ba ni gcig nyid dang rim pa 'gal ba khyab pa yin no zhes bya ba de nyid slar 'khor ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The endlessness is pervaded by the contradiction of singularity and sequence. This is the meaning of it would be a cycle.

original: gcig nyid la rim pa yang rim pa ma yin pa'i khyab byed dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: gcig nyid la rim pa yang rim pa ma yin pa'i khyab byed dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching that oneness is contradictory with the pervasion of the non-nonstage is:

original: gzugs la mngon par zhen pa'i gnas skabs na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs la mngon par zhen pa'i gnas skabs na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: At the time of attachment to form.

original: mngon par zhen pa nyid ni mngon par zhen pa po yin te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa nyid ni mngon par zhen pa po yin te /
translated: Attachment itself is the one who is attached.

original: de la gzhan du rtog par byed na de la yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir thug pa med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de la gzhan du rtog par byed na de la yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir thug pa med par bstan pa ni /
translated: If one conceives of it as other, then since it would be other, there would be an infinite regress. The teaching of this is:

original: de la yang gzhan gyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la yang gzhan gyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Also, by another.

original: gzugs kyi rtog pa'i rang gi ngo bo la bdag nyid du gyur pa'i rtog pa ma mthong ba bzhin du gzhan du gyur pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma mthong ba bshad par bya'o zhes bstan pa ni /üîΩdes ni dus mtshungs rnam par shes //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rtog pa'i rang gi ngo bo la bdag nyid du gyur pa'i rtog pa ma mthong ba bzhin du gzhan du gyur pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma mthong ba bshad par bya'o zhes bstan pa ni / des ni dus mtshungs rnam par shes //
translated: Just as the nature of the conception of form is not seen as the self, the conception of the other is not seen. This should be explained. The teaching of this is:

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: By that, consciousness of the same time.

original: gzugs bzhin du de'i nyams su myong ba la nyams su myong ba ni brtags pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzugs bzhin du de'i nyams su myong ba la nyams su myong ba ni brtags pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The experience of that is not imagined, like the experience of form. This is the meaning.

original: gzugs zhes bya ba la gzugs las gzhan ba'i rnam par rtog pa nyams su myong ba ji ltar de bzhin du de ltar bur gyur pa nyams su myong ba yang de las gzhan pa dang rtogs pa yang yin no snyam du sems pa la des na zhes pa
analyzed: gzugs zhes bya ba la gzugs las gzhan ba'i rnam par rtog pa nyams su myong ba ji ltar de bzhin du de ltar bur gyur pa nyams su myong ba yang de las gzhan pa dang rtogs pa yang yin no snyam du sems pa la des na zhes pa
translated: Just as one experiences a conception of form that is different from form, in the same way, one experiences the experience of that, which is different from it and is also the realization of it.

original: ste gzugs nyams su myong ba bzhin du de nyams su myong ba'i las nyams su myong ba gzhan nyid yin na de yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir thug pa med pas gzugs nyams su myong ba med cing de'i nyams su myong ba yang med pa'i phyir rang rig pa
analyzed: ste gzugs nyams su myong ba bzhin du de nyams su myong ba'i las nyams su myong ba gzhan nyid yin na de yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir thug pa med pas gzugs nyams su myong ba med cing de'i nyams su myong ba yang med pa'i phyir rang rig pa
translated: Thus, if the experience of the action of experiencing that were different from the experience of that, then that would also be different, and so there would be an infinite regress. Therefore, since there would be no experience of form and no experience of that,

original: nyid la nyams su myong ba btsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nyid la nyams su myong ba btsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: one should search for the experience in reflexive awareness itself.

original: @74b tha snyad pa rnams don 'dzin par 'dod pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang don rtogs par byed pa ma yin na /
analyzed: @74b tha snyad pa rnams don 'dzin par 'dod pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang don rtogs par byed pa ma yin na /
translated: The opponent does not assert that conventional consciousnesses apprehend objects, but if they do not realize objects,üîΩthen how could they be consciousnesses?

original: dus gzhan du don shes pa nyid kyis gzhan du mi 'thad pas don shes pa yin no zhes go bar byed do snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: dus gzhan du don shes pa nyid kyis gzhan du mi 'thad pas don shes pa yin no zhes go bar byed do snyam du sems pa la /
translated: But at another time, by the mere understanding of the object, one understands that it is the cognition of the object, because it is not tenable that it is otherwise.

original: 'das pa la ni dran par 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'das pa la ni dran par 'gyur // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: But it is remembered as past.

original: nyams su myong ba'i shes pa nyid kho na shes so zhes dran pa yin gyi blo gzhan gyis 'dzin pa 'das pa nyid kyis med pa'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i shes pa nyid kho na shes so zhes dran pa yin gyi blo gzhan gyis 'dzin pa 'das pa nyid kyis med pa'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The cognition of the object is remembered as ‚ÄúI cognized it,‚Äù but it is not apprehended by another cognition, because the past itself does not exist.

original: gang gi phyir med pa dmigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir med pa dmigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Because the nonexistent is not apprehended,

original: dmigs pa nyid kho na la yod par tha snyad yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dmigs pa nyid kho na la yod par tha snyad yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the meaning is that the existent is conventionally designated as the object of cognition.

original: skyes pa'i don gyi shes pa ni rang gi shes pa skye ba'i dus kho na na gnas pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: skyes pa'i don gyi shes pa ni rang gi shes pa skye ba'i dus kho na na gnas pa ma yin nam /
translated: The cognition of the object that has arisen does not endure at the time of the arising of its own cognition, does it?

original: gang gi phyir shes pa gnyis kyis lhan cig skyes pa dgag pa yin gyi lhan cig gnas pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir shes pa gnyis kyis lhan cig skyes pa dgag pa yin gyi lhan cig gnas pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Because the simultaneity of two cognitions is refuted, but not their coexistence.

original: skad cig pa nyid kyang myur du 'jig pa'i bsam pas yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: skad cig pa nyid kyang myur du 'jig pa'i bsam pas yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: The mind is momentary, and it is destroyed quickly.

original: gzhan gyi blo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi blo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the opinion of the other party.

original: blo ni blo gzhan gyi dus su gnas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: blo ni blo gzhan gyi dus su gnas pa ma yin te /
translated: The mind does not endure for the time of another mind,

original: skyes pa'i dus bzhin du don nyams su myong ba rjes su 'jug par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes pa'i dus bzhin du don nyams su myong ba rjes su 'jug par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because, like the moment of its birth, it would be followed by the experience of an object.

original: 'on kyang rtogs pa tsam gyis so //
analyzed: 'on kyang rtogs pa tsam gyis so //
translated: But it is only the cognition.

original: de lta na sngon po'i shes pa ser po la sogs pa'i shes pa gzhan las khyad par med par rtogs par 'gyur te rnam pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na sngon po'i shes pa ser po la sogs pa'i shes pa gzhan las khyad par med par rtogs par 'gyur te rnam pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In that case, the cognition of blue would be indistinguishable from the cognition of yellow, etc., because they would be without aspects.

original: rang dang gzhan gyi shes pa'i rnam pa'i dbye ba med par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang dang gzhan gyi shes pa'i rnam pa'i dbye ba med par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And there would be no distinction between one‚Äôs own and another‚Äôs cognition.

original: gang gi phyir bdag dang yid phrad pa skyes bzhin pa'i shes pa ni mngon sum ma ma rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bdag dang yid phrad pa skyes bzhin pa'i shes pa ni mngon sum ma ma rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin te /
translated: The cognition that is produced by the contact of self and mind is neither direct perception nor inference,

original: ming tha dad pa tsam gyis bye ba yin te /
analyzed: ming tha dad pa tsam gyis bye ba yin te /
translated: because it is distinguished by a mere difference in name.

original: gzung ba'am 'dzin pa'i shes pa la yang rang la yong pa'i khyad par med pa'i phyir dang / khyad par du byed pa gzhan yang med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzung ba'am 'dzin pa'i shes pa la yang rang la yong pa'i khyad par med pa'i phyir dang / khyad par du byed pa gzhan yang med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because there is no difference in the way that the consciousness apprehending the object or the apprehending consciousness arises, and because there is no other way to distinguish them.

original: gzhan dang 'brel pa can gyi blo de'i yongs su gcod pa de dang gcig pa'i rang gi blo yin la /
analyzed: gzhan dang 'brel pa can gyi blo de'i yongs su gcod pa de dang gcig pa'i rang gi blo yin la /
translated: The cognition that is related to the other is the cognition that is the same as the cognition that is the exclusion of that.

original: de'i blo yongs su gcod pa'i rang rig pa'i rnam pa dag bas len pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de'i blo yongs su gcod pa'i rang rig pa'i rnam pa dag bas len pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Because the aspect of the cognition that is the exclusion of that is the cognition that is the exclusion of that.

original: sngar yang zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe da ltar gyur pa'o //üîΩ'das pa nyid du khas len na da ltar ba nyid du mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sngar yang zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe da ltar gyur pa'o // 'das pa nyid du khas len na da ltar ba nyid du mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúPreviously‚Äù means when it is present.üîΩThe statement ‚ÄúIf it is accepted as past, it would not be present‚Äù is explained as follows.

original: kun tshe 'das pa'i dngos po yin par zhes bya ba'o //üîΩ'gal lo zhes bya ba ni gcig nyid la rim pa la 'gal ba khyab pa yin la /
analyzed: kun tshe 'das pa'i dngos po yin par zhes bya ba'o // 'gal lo zhes bya ba ni gcig nyid la rim pa la 'gal ba khyab pa yin la /
translated: If it is accepted as past, it would not be present.üîΩ‚ÄúContradictory‚Äù means that it is contradictory for something to be both one and sequential.

original: @75a * // rim pa yang de la 'di'i khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: @75a * // rim pa yang de la 'di'i khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: And sequence is the pervasion of that.

original: rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa'i 'brel ba can rtogs pa ni de'i med pa kho na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pa'i 'brel ba can rtogs pa ni de'i med pa kho na zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The cognition that is related to the apprehension of its own nature is connected with the expression ‚Äúonly its nonexistence.‚Äù

original: 'das pa'i shes pa gzhan gyis rig bzhin pa ni gzhan gyi blo'i rtogs pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba yin gyi da ltar ni ma yin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: 'das pa'i shes pa gzhan gyis rig bzhin pa ni gzhan gyi blo'i rtogs pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba yin gyi da ltar ni ma yin no zhes bshad do //
translated: The cognition of the past is like the cognition of another‚Äôs mind, but it is not present.

original: gal te myong ba zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi shes pa'o //
analyzed: gal te myong ba zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi shes pa'o //
translated: If the so-called experience is the cognition of form,

original: ji ltar gzhan gyi shes pa lkog tu gyur pa bzhin du rang gi shes pa yang 'dzin par byed pa'i dus su 'das pa yin pas lkog tu gyur pa yin par bstan pa ni 'das pa lkog gyur ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan gyi shes pa lkog tu gyur pa bzhin du rang gi shes pa yang 'dzin par byed pa'i dus su 'das pa yin pas lkog tu gyur pa yin par bstan pa ni 'das pa lkog gyur ces bya ba'o //
translated: then just as the cognition of another is hidden, so too the cognition of oneself is hidden at the time of apprehension, because it is past. This is indicated by the words ‚Äúthe past is hidden.‚Äù

original: rang gi blo lkog tu gyur pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi blo lkog tu gyur pa ma yin no //
translated: One‚Äôs own mind is not hidden.

original: gang gis gzhan gyi blo yongs su gcod pa dang mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis gzhan gyi blo yongs su gcod pa dang mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: How can it be the same as the cognition of another?

original: 'on kyang mngon sum pa yin pas gzugs bzhin du 'dzin par byed pa gzhan gyis gzung ba yin no snyam du sems pa ni ci ste rang gi blo ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang mngon sum pa yin pas gzugs bzhin du 'dzin par byed pa gzhan gyis gzung ba yin no snyam du sems pa ni ci ste rang gi blo ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The thought that it is so is expressed by the words ‚Äúif your mind.‚Äù

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni shes pa gzhan gyis rtogs bya nyid yin na rjes su dpog pa'i rtogs bya dang mtshungs pa nyid kho na yin te /
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni shes pa gzhan gyis rtogs bya nyid yin na rjes su dpog pa'i rtogs bya dang mtshungs pa nyid kho na yin te /
translated: If it is the object of another cognition, it is just like the object of inference,

original: rtogs bya'i ngo bo rtogs pa la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs bya'i ngo bo rtogs pa la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no difference in the nature of the object of cognition that is cognized.

original: mngon du byed pa'i rang bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa la'o //
analyzed: mngon du byed pa'i rang bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rang rig pa la'o //
translated: The words ‚Äúin the nature of manifestation‚Äù refer to reflexive awareness.

original: 'dzin byed 'byung ba'i dus su gzugs 'dzin pa'i bya ba byed pa'i shes pa nyid gzung bya ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /üîΩdon rig 'das pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dzin byed 'byung ba'i dus su gzugs 'dzin pa'i bya ba byed pa'i shes pa nyid gzung bya ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la / don rig 'das pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: When the apprehender arises, is it not the case that the cognition that performs the action of apprehending form is the object of apprehension?üîΩThe thought that it is so is expressed by the words ‚Äúthe past cognition of the object.‚Äù

original: de lta bu'i ni 'dzin par byed pa'i dus na 'das pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de lta bu'i ni 'dzin par byed pa'i dus na 'das pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that at the time of the apprehender, it is just past.

original: 'das pa zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi yul ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'das pa zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi yul ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: The past is not the object of direct perception.

original: dpe dag dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: dpe dag dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Free from examples means that it is not the object of inference.

original: rtag ni yod min te zhes bya ba ni med na rjes su dpag pa med pa ste /
analyzed: rtag ni yod min te zhes bya ba ni med na rjes su dpag pa med pa ste /
translated: It is not permanent means that if it does not exist, there is no inference.

original: shes pa nyid ni blo nyid yin te dbang po la sogs pa'i byed pa las byung ba yin na nang gi bdag nyid kyi 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin gyi blos ci zhig bya /
analyzed: shes pa nyid ni blo nyid yin te dbang po la sogs pa'i byed pa las byung ba yin na nang gi bdag nyid kyi 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin gyi blos ci zhig bya /
translated: Consciousness itself is cognition. If it arises from the activity of the sense faculties, etc., what would the cognition of an internal self do?

original: dbang po la sogs pa'i byed pa ni blo ma yin te sems pa can ma yin pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa'i byed pa ni blo ma yin te sems pa can ma yin pa'i phyir la /
translated: The activity of the sense faculties, etc., is not cognition because it is not mental.

original: sems pa can ni blo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems pa can ni blo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The mental is cognition because it is mental.

original: 'grel pa byed pa pos ni dpe dang bral ba dang / rtags med pa nyid la /
analyzed: 'grel pa byed pa pos ni dpe dang bral ba dang / rtags med pa nyid la /
translated: The commentator explains that it is free from examples and devoid of reason.

original: rgyu yin zhes bshad pa ni //
analyzed: rgyu yin zhes bshad pa ni //
translated: It is the cause.

original: shes pa 'das pa la dpe ni med de zhes @75b bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa 'das pa la dpe ni med de zhes @75b bya ba'o //
translated: There is no example for past cognition.

original: rig pa nyid ces bya ba ni rang rig pa nyid la ste /
analyzed: rig pa nyid ces bya ba ni rang rig pa nyid la ste /
translated: It is self-awareness.

original: rnam par dbye ba ni rang dang gzhan dag gi rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba ni rang dang gzhan dag gi rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: The analysis is the inference of oneself and others.

original: snga ma'i blo de da ltar blo gang gis yin pa de ni de'i snga ma yang la blo yang yin pa de ni 'dzin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: snga ma'i blo de da ltar blo gang gis yin pa de ni de'i snga ma yang la blo yang yin pa de ni 'dzin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: The cognition of the prior cognition is not the cognition of that, because it is not the cognition of itself.

original: rang rig par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni gzugs la sogs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang rig par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni gzugs la sogs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is taught by ‚Äúform, etc.‚Äù

original: de blo gzhan gyis 'dzin pa khas len na de'i 'dzin pa btsal dogs so //
analyzed: de blo gzhan gyis 'dzin pa khas len na de'i 'dzin pa btsal dogs so //
translated: If one accepts that it is apprehended by another cognition, then the apprehension of that is sought.

original: gzhan du na snga ma 'dzin pa mi srod par 'gyur la /
analyzed: gzhan du na snga ma 'dzin pa mi srod par 'gyur la /
translated: Otherwise, the prior cognition would not be apprehended.

original: de bzhin du de'i yang zhes thug pa med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du de'i yang zhes thug pa med par bstan pa ni /
translated: In the same way, the teaching of the infinite regress is

original: de las gzhan pa'i blo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i blo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúby another cognition than that.‚Äù

original: rgyur gyur pa de'i snga ma'i blo de 'dzin par 'dod par ni mi 'gyur te bar du chod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyur gyur pa de'i snga ma'i blo de 'dzin par 'dod par ni mi 'gyur te bar du chod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The prior cognition that is the cause of that is not accepted as the apprehender, because it is obstructed.

original: 'di'i don bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di'i don bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the meaning of this is

original: blo'i blos de de ma thag tu snang ba can gang yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: blo'i blos de de ma thag tu snang ba can gang yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúthat which is the cognition of the cognition of that, which is the appearance of that immediately after.‚Äù

original: bar mtshams med pa'i gzugs kyi blo ni gzung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: bar mtshams med pa'i gzugs kyi blo ni gzung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: The cognition of form, which is without interval, is not apprehended,

original: blo'i blos skad cig re re zhing bar du chod pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: blo'i blos skad cig re re zhing bar du chod pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because the cognition of cognition is interrupted by each instant.

original: brdar bya mi nus pa zhes bya ba ni rtog pa med pa nyid la gtan tshigs kyi tshig go //
analyzed: brdar bya mi nus pa zhes bya ba ni rtog pa med pa nyid la gtan tshigs kyi tshig go //
translated: The statement of the reason, ‚Äúbecause it cannot be conventionally designated,‚Äù means because it is devoid of conceptualization.

original: sbyor bar mi rung ba'i nye bar mtshon pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sbyor bar mi rung ba'i nye bar mtshon pa bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement of the illustration of the unsuitability of application isüîΩ‚Äúbecause it is not suitable as the referent of a word.‚Äù

original: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis ni zhes bya ba'o //üîΩdon dam pa ma yin du zin kyang brtags pa la ni 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni ci ste 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis ni zhes bya ba'o // don dam pa ma yin du zin kyang brtags pa la ni 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni ci ste 'di ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement of the reason is ‚Äúbecause it is not the referent of a word.‚ÄùüîΩThe statement of the reason is ‚Äúbecause it is not the referent of a word.‚ÄùüîΩThe statement of the reason is ‚Äúbecause it is not the referent of a word.‚ÄùüîΩThe statement of the reason is ‚Äúbecause it is not the referent of a word.‚Äù

original: de kho na ltar nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de kho na ltar nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement of the reason is ‚Äúbecause it is not the referent

original: de 'di ltar ma nges pa'i yul can gyi rtog pa ni nges pa 'dzin pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de 'di ltar ma nges pa'i yul can gyi rtog pa ni nges pa 'dzin pa ma yin la /
translated: The conceptual thought whose object is not ascertained does not grasp the ascertained object.

original: de 'dzin par byed pa'i shes pa rtog pa med pa btsal dgos so zhes bstan pa ni rtog pa med pa med na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de 'dzin par byed pa'i shes pa rtog pa med pa btsal dgos so zhes bstan pa ni rtog pa med pa med na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement that it is necessary to seek a non-conceptual consciousness that grasps that is ‚Äúif there were no non-conceptual . . .‚Äù

original: de dang don gcig pa zhes bya ba ni sgra dang yul mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: de dang don gcig pa zhes bya ba ni sgra dang yul mtshungs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving the same object‚Äù means having the same object as the sound.

original: de 'dzin pa'i shes pa dang lhan gcig po de la rag las pa'ang 'di la /
analyzed: de 'dzin pa'i shes pa dang lhan gcig po de la rag las pa'ang 'di la /
translated: The consciousness that grasps that is simultaneous with it and is dependent on it.

original: shes pa yin pa nges gzung bar bya ba nyid do //üîΩrgyu mtshan gang gis kyang rtogs pa pa'i gzhi mthun pa nyid du bstan pa ni /
analyzed: shes pa yin pa nges gzung bar bya ba nyid do // rgyu mtshan gang gis kyang rtogs pa pa'i gzhi mthun pa nyid du bstan pa ni /
translated: It is the consciousness that is ascertained as the apprehender.üîΩThe statement that there is no common locus for those two is ‚Äúbecause they are mutually exclusive.‚Äù

original: don gcig byed pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: don gcig byed pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause they perform the same function‚Äù means that they have the same effect.

original: shes kun zhes bya ba ni sgra las byung ba yang ngo //
analyzed: shes kun zhes bya ba ni sgra las byung ba yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúAll consciousnesses‚Äù means those arisen from words.

original: rig par bya ba ni rig pa'i yul lo //üîΩ'o na @76a * //üîΩde zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
analyzed: rig par bya ba ni rig pa'i yul lo // 'o na @76a * // de zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat which is to be known‚Äù is the object of knowledge.üîΩ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the universal.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni spyi nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni spyi nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThat itself‚Äù refers to the universal itself.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni khyad par tsam snang ba'i dus su'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni khyad par tsam snang ba'i dus su'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAt that time‚Äù is the time of the appearance of the mere particular.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni spyi'i'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni spyi'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù is the universal.

original: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyis so //
analyzed: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy that‚Äù is by the particular.

original: de'i ni spyi'i'o //
analyzed: de'i ni spyi'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù is the universal.

original: de kho na nyid ni khyad par nyid do //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ni khyad par nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúReality‚Äù is the particular itself.

original: gal te der zhes bya ba ni sngar mthong ba'i spyi'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: gal te der zhes bya ba ni sngar mthong ba'i spyi'i ngo bo ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIf that‚Äù is the universal form that was seen before.

original: gcig nyid du mi snang ba zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: gcig nyid du mi snang ba zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúDoes not appear as one‚Äù is connected.

original: rgyu med pas zhes bya ba ni rgyu mig la sogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: rgyu med pas zhes bya ba ni rgyu mig la sogs pa med pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the absence of a cause‚Äù is the absence of a cause such as the eye.

original: rang rig pa bzhin du don gyi shes pa rtog pa med pa dang de bzhin brdar byar mi nus pa zhes bya ba yin la /
analyzed: rang rig pa bzhin du don gyi shes pa rtog pa med pa dang de bzhin brdar byar mi nus pa zhes bya ba yin la /
translated: ‚ÄúLike self-awareness, the nonconceptual cognition of the object cannot be indicated by convention.‚Äù

original: gal te rtog med 'ga' zhig kyang //
analyzed: gal te rtog med 'ga' zhig kyang //
translated: ‚ÄúIf there were any nonconceptual cognition‚Äù

original: yong na zhes bya ba ni khyad par rtogs pa bzhin du sgra dang mtshungs pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir rnal 'byor pa'i yid la sogs pa'i shes pa rtog pa med par bstan pa ni yin no //
analyzed: yong na zhes bya ba ni khyad par rtogs pa bzhin du sgra dang mtshungs pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir rnal 'byor pa'i yid la sogs pa'i shes pa rtog pa med par bstan pa ni yin no //
translated: ‚Äúat all‚Äù is connected. Because it is not an object that is similar to sound, like the understanding of a particular, it is taught that the nonconceptual cognition of the yogi‚Äôs mind, and so on, is not an object of words.

original: de'i phyir zlos pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir zlos pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, it is not redundant.

original: de dang mtshungs rgyu can zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i yul can no //
analyzed: de dang mtshungs rgyu can zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i yul can no //
translated: That which has a similar cause is one that has a definite object.

original: rtog pa dang rtog pa med pa dag ni ma nges pa dang cig shos kyi yul nyid kyis rgyu mtshungs pa can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rtog pa dang rtog pa med pa dag ni ma nges pa dang cig shos kyi yul nyid kyis rgyu mtshungs pa can ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Conceptual and non-conceptual are taught to be similar causes because they are the objects of the indefinite and the other.

original: phyi rol don la ltos med par //
analyzed: phyi rol don la ltos med par //
translated: Without depending on external objects,

original: zhes bya ba ni 'di sbyor ba'i rang bzhin yang yin la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'di sbyor ba'i rang bzhin yang yin la /
translated: This is the nature of the application.

original: mi dpyod pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rtog pa yang yin pas /
analyzed: mi dpyod pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rtog pa yang yin pas /
translated: It is also the nature of the non-analytical conceptual cognition, and so on.

original: dbang po'i shes pa dang de yang ngo zhes gnyis gnyis pa'i bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pa dang de yang ngo zhes gnyis gnyis pa'i bsdu ba'o //
translated: The two, the sense consciousness and that, are included in the two.

original: rang gi ngo bo ste skye ba ni rang gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ste skye ba ni rang gi ngo bo'o //
translated: Its own nature, that is, arising, is its own nature.

original: de la tshogs pa de'i dngos po ni skye ba ste de la brten pa'i phyir de la rten can yin gyi /
analyzed: de la tshogs pa de'i dngos po ni skye ba ste de la brten pa'i phyir de la rten can yin gyi /
translated: The entity of that collection is arising, and because it depends on that, it is based on that.

original: de la brten pas ni /
analyzed: de la brten pas ni /
translated: But it is not based on that.

original: 'gal ba'i tshogs pa'i ngo bo la brten pa'i rang bzhin gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i tshogs pa'i ngo bo la brten pa'i rang bzhin gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not based on the nature of a collection of contradictory things.

original: sgra dang spyi la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i zhes bya ba ni don ji snyed pa kho na ming gi sgra rnams yin no zhes bstan pas sgra dang 'brel pa can yin no //
analyzed: sgra dang spyi la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i zhes bya ba ni don ji snyed pa kho na ming gi sgra rnams yin no zhes bstan pas sgra dang 'brel pa can yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúconnected with words, universals, etc.‚Äù indicates that the words of a name are connected with the object to the extent that the object is.

original: phyi rol dang sgra la sogs pa'i 'brel pa khas blangs nas bstan pa ni /üîΩgang zhig gang dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyi rol dang sgra la sogs pa'i 'brel pa khas blangs nas bstan pa ni / gang zhig gang dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúconnected with external things, words, etc.‚Äù

original: sgra dang lhan cig pa nyid don la med do zhes bya ba ni sgra mi 'dzin par zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra dang lhan cig pa nyid don la med do zhes bya ba ni sgra mi 'dzin par zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúconnected with words, universals, etc.‚Äù indicates that the words of a name are connected with the object to the extent that the object is.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúconnected with external things, words, etc.‚ÄùüîΩThe phrase ‚Äúconnected with words, universals, etc.‚Äù indicates that the words of a name are connected with the object to the extent that the object is.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúconnected with external things, words, etc.‚ÄùüîΩThe phrase ‚Äúconnected with words, universals, etc.‚Äù indicates that the words of a name are connected with the object to the extent that the object is.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúconnected with external things, words, etc.‚Äù

original: brda 'dzin pa las snga rol du brjod bya nyid du mi dran pa'i phyir rtog pa med par ni bden mod kyi dus phyis dran pa dang lhan cig byed pa'i dbang po las skyes pa rnam par rtog pa can yin no zhes zer ba ni ji ste 'gyurüîΩna @76b yang 'di ba lang ngo zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: brda 'dzin pa las snga rol du brjod bya nyid du mi dran pa'i phyir rtog pa med par ni bden mod kyi dus phyis dran pa dang lhan cig byed pa'i dbang po las skyes pa rnam par rtog pa can yin no zhes zer ba ni ji ste 'gyur na @76b yang 'di ba lang ngo zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúconnected with words, universals, etc.‚Äù indicates that the words of a name are connected with the object to the extent that the object is.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúconnected with external things, words, etc.‚Äù

original: phyi rol don la ltos med par //
analyzed: phyi rol don la ltos med par //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúconnected with words

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúit is not reasonable‚Äù is that it is not tenable.

original: nges pa can gyi dran pa ni 'bad pa la sogs pa las mi 'byung bas don mthong ba las 'byung ba de'i phyir don mthong ba ni du ba la sogs pa bzhin du brdas mthong ba'i dran pa nyid la bya ba byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: nges pa can gyi dran pa ni 'bad pa la sogs pa las mi 'byung bas don mthong ba las 'byung ba de'i phyir don mthong ba ni du ba la sogs pa bzhin du brdas mthong ba'i dran pa nyid la bya ba byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Since memory that is certain does not arise from effort and so on, it arises from seeing the object. Therefore seeing the object functions with respect to memory that sees through a sign, like smoke and so on.

original: mngon sum skyed pa la ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mngon sum skyed pa la ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: It does not generate direct perception.

original: gal te gzugs ni brda dran na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te gzugs ni brda dran na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is stated in the line ‚ÄúIf form is the memory of a sign.‚Äù

original: me dang 'brel pa'i du ba ni me dran par byed pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: me dang 'brel pa'i du ba ni me dran par byed pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt smoke that is related to fire what causes the memory of fire?

original: gzugs kyang sgra dang 'brel pa can gzung ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: gzugs kyang sgra dang 'brel pa can gzung ba nyid yin te /
translated: Form is also that which is apprehended as related to sound.üîΩBecause a sign is understood to be the nature of the expressed and the expresser, it is the cause of the memory of the object.

original: gang gi phyir brda ni brjod bya rjod byed kyi ngo bor rtogs par byed pa nyid kho na don gyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang bral ba sgra dang don dag gi 'brel pa dngos su ma yin du zin kyang skyes bu'i blos de lta bu
analyzed: gang gi phyir brda ni brjod bya rjod byed kyi ngo bor rtogs par byed pa nyid kho na don gyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang bral ba sgra dang don dag gi 'brel pa dngos su ma yin du zin kyang skyes bu'i blos de lta bu
translated: Even though the relation between a word and its meaning is not directly a relation of the forward and backward pervasion, the mind of a person understands that the word and its meaning are related in that way.

original: kho na rnam par 'jog pa yin no //
analyzed: kho na rnam par 'jog pa yin no //
translated: and the cognition of the universal is established on the basis of that.

original: gzhan du na blo'i rgyu mtshan yod pa kho nar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan du na blo'i rgyu mtshan yod pa kho nar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Otherwise, the cause of cognition would not exist at all.

original: sgra dang dbyug pa la sogs pa bzhin du ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i spyi mthong ba dran pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sgra dang dbyug pa la sogs pa bzhin du ba lang nyid la sogs pa'i spyi mthong ba dran pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The following is stated to show that the memory of the universal is not the memory of what was seen, as in the case of the word, stick, etc.

original: 'on te spyi mthong ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te spyi mthong ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or, the universal is seen.

original: lkog shal la sogs pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa mthong nas de dang 'dra ba'i yan lag dang ldan pa mthong ba dran pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: lkog shal la sogs pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa mthong nas de dang 'dra ba'i yan lag dang ldan pa mthong ba dran pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The following is stated to show that the memory of what was seen is the memory of what was seen as possessing parts similar to those seen, such as the dewlap, etc.

original: cha shas mtshungs pa nyid ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: cha shas mtshungs pa nyid ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Similarity of parts.

original: 'dra ba nyid ni gzhan mthong bas rnam par rtog pa mthong ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir bag chags tsam las byung ba ni tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid ni gzhan mthong bas rnam par rtog pa mthong ba'i yul can yin pa'i phyir bag chags tsam las byung ba ni tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: Since similarity is the object of a conceptual cognition that sees something else, it does not arise from mere latent impressions and is not a valid cognition,

original: gtso bo dang dbang phyug la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzhin du'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gtso bo dang dbang phyug la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzhin du'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: like the conceptual cognition of primal matter, ƒ™≈õvara, etc.

original: sbyor ba ni me dang ngo zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni me dang ngo zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: The application is like fire and fuel.

original: dbang po'i shes pa ni me ma bzung bas sbyor bar byed pa'i bdag nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pa ni me ma bzung bas sbyor bar byed pa'i bdag nyid ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The sense perception is not the nature of the application because it does not apprehend the fire.

original: dbang po'i shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is shown by the words ‚Äúsense perception.‚Äù

original: de ma thag tu zhes bya bas ni dbye ba med pa la yang tha dad par tha snyad 'dogs pa nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: de ma thag tu zhes bya bas ni dbye ba med pa la yang tha dad par tha snyad 'dogs pa nyid du bstan to //
translated: The word ‚Äúimmediately‚Äù shows that even without a break, there is the conventional expression of difference.

original: de yang thog ma med pa nas zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i bag chags kyi snying po can gyi rtags kyi shes pa sbyor ba'i ngo bo ni rjes su dpag pa skyed par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de yang thog ma med pa nas zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i bag chags kyi snying po can gyi rtags kyi shes pa sbyor ba'i ngo bo ni rjes su dpag pa skyed par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: And that is from beginningless time. The meaning is that the inferential cognition, which has the essence of such a latent impression, is the nature of the application, and it generates the inference.

original: rjes su dpag pas sbyor ba med pa'i skyon rjes su brjod nas dgag pa byed pa ni rjes su dpag pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas sbyor ba med pa'i skyon rjes su brjod nas dgag pa byed pa ni rjes su dpag pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Having stated the fault of the absence of application in inference, he refutes it with the words ‚ÄúInference also.‚Äù

original: gzugs las dran pa yid @77a * //
analyzed: gzugs las dran pa yid @77a * //
translated: Memory of form is not the nature of the application of inference.

original: la de las kyang mngon sum ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la dran pa de las de'i ngo bo dang 'brel pa ste nye ba yin na ni de dang 'brel pa yin la /
analyzed: la de las kyang mngon sum ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la dran pa de las de'i ngo bo dang 'brel pa ste nye ba yin na ni de dang 'brel pa yin la /
translated: If the object is related to the memory, then it is related to the memory.
